name: Mini Clarifying Blemish & Oil Control Cleanser
about: What it is:A foaming gel cleanser that targets blemish-causing impurities and balances oil with natural salicylic acid and AHAs for clear, comfortably matte skin..Skin Type:Oily and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Acne, Blemishes, Pores, and OIliness.Formulation:Liquid.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of toxins, fillers, artificials, synthetics, and GMOs. This product is cruelty-free ..What Else You Need to Know:Tata Harper is a real skincare company. They do it all themselves with their own chemists at their own farm. No synthetics. No outsourcing. No shortcuts.
ingredients: -Prickly Pear Flower Enzymes: Exfoliates to encourage cell renewal and helps clear buildup to prevent blemishes without over-drying.-Wild Crafted Juniper Fruit: Helps balance oil without disrupting the natural pH-balance or over-drying for a healthy-looking complexion..-Chlorella: Helps nourish the skin to soothe redness and calm irritation, plus it gives the formula its signature green color... Hordeum Vulgare Leaf Juice*, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Coco Glucoside, Glycerin, Decyl Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Water, Maltooligosyl Glucoside, Mel/Honey/Miel, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Aroma**, Hydrolyzed Opuntia Ficus-Indica Flower Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Gaultheria Procumbens (Wintergreen) Leaf Extract, L (+) Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Yucca Schidigera Extract, Chlorella Pyrenoidosa, Juniperus Communis Fruit Extract, Saccharide Isomerate, Arnica Montana (Arnica) Extract*, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Leaf Extract*, Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract*, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Extract*, Spiraea Ulmaria (Meadowsweet) Extract*, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil*, Serenoa Serrulata Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Sambucus Nigra Fruit Extract, p-Anisic Acid, Menthol, Menthyl Lactate, Sodium Phytate, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Caproyl/Lauroyl Lactylate, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, CI 77288, Alcohol, Limonene, Linalool.....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Apply onto dry skin. Massage 2 to 3 pumps onto face and neck, then rinse with warm water. Follow with essence. Use AM & PM. ..Warning: Avoid direct contact with eyes....Our tubes are made from post-consumer recycled plastic. Just  twist off the cap, cut the sealed end open, rinse out the tube,  and toss it in your recycling bin.  .Our caps are made from mixed materials. Unfortunately, the  caps are not recyclable due to their size and composition.  .Our cartons are made from Forest Stewardship Council certified  paperboard. Just breakdown the box and toss it in your  recycling bin. .Our leaflets are made from paper. Just toss it in your recycling  bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser stands out for its effectiveness and gentleness. This plant based formula targets blemishes with salicylic acid from willow bark while calming the skin with soothing aloe vera. It deeply cleanses, removing impurities and excess oil without stripping or drying.   The gel texture foams lightly, and the herbal scent creates a spa like experience that I really appreciate and absolutely love. Over time, it reduces redness and inflammation, making it ideal for hormonal breakouts or mild acne. This product is ideal for anyone looking for clean, luxurious skincare that provides results. The fact that’s it’s also eco friendly, is icing to the cake.   I truly enjoyed experiencing such a luxurious cleanser. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m 28 and I’ve got oily and acne prone skin type. I have tried many different cleansers but this definitely takes the cake! I hate to say this and love this as much as I do because it’s so Expensive!!! But if you have acne-prone or congested skin, the Clarifying Cleanser is a game-changer. It’s definitely worth every penny! It’s a lightweight gel that deeply cleans your skin without leaving it feeling dry or tight. With salicylic acid and natural botanicals, it tackles breakouts, blackheads, and redness like a pro. After using it regularly, my skin looked clearer and felt calmer. The cooling effect is super refreshing, especially in the morning—it really wakes you up! It’s strong enough to work on problem areas but still gentle enough to use every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and I’m absolutely in love with it. It’s comes in this beautiful green glass bottle with pump that delivers the right amount needed to be used. The clarifying cleanser is out of this world. Not only it does smell amazing and gives you a nice fresh feeling into your skin, kind of wakes me up every morning. But, it’s also gratifying using after removing my make up. It does removes any impurities left behind and I feel my skin completely clean without leaving that feeling of harsh dry skin that other cleansers do. I’ve been using for more than a week and I can feel a great difference in my skin texture and glow. I love using after the exfoliator every night to make sure I remove any impurities I grab during the day. I totally recommended it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is a standout product for anyone dealing with blemish-prone or congested skin. This gel-based cleanser features natural salicylic acid from wintergreen, which helps to exfoliate and unclog pores, while soothing botanicals like arnica and aloe vera calm redness and irritation. It’s designed to deeply cleanse without stripping the skin, and it delivers on that promise.  The refreshing cooling sensation during application feels invigorating, making it a pleasure to use both morning and night. After consistent use, I’ve noticed a visible reduction in breakouts, smoother skin texture, and a more balanced complexion. Unlike many clarifying cleansers, it leaves my skin feeling clean and hydrated rather than dry or tight.  While it’s a premium product with a higher price point, the results and the use of 100% natural ingredients make it a worthwhile investment for those looking to elevate their skincare routine. Ideal for anyone seeking an effective yet gentle solution to keep their skin clear and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my thirties and have combination skin with a very shiny T zone. I was excited to try this Clarifying cleanser by Tata Harper, because it claims to help oily and combination skin be healthier and matte. My first impression of the product was the it is an elegant cleanser with a glass bottle and an easy to use pump. The cleanser itself is green and has a very nice scent. Two pumps were enough for my face and neck, the cleanser has a watery consistency. I massaged it to dry skin and then added water to see it foam, and does it foam quite a lot! It makes the experience feel so satisfying because it makes it soft while it combats the oil and blemishes on the skin. My skin felt soft and looked so matte once I dried it but it did not feel tight. The scent is great! It is pricey but worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past two weeks, I have really started to notice the effect it has on my oil production. I have extremely oily skin and also very red & flushy complexion, and this cleanser has really started to change that for me! The smell is so invigorating and smells like a fancy hotel! I love how Tata Harper’s products make me feel like I am transported to the spa. This is not overly drying or irritating so it’s a very easy way to add some AHA and BHA into your skincare routine! I alternate this cleanser with the regenerating cleanser from Tata Harper and also include the mask a few times per week. I have really noticed a difference in the clarity and light in my skin and I feel so much more confident in my skin! I was really starting to struggle with being unable to get my pores to look cleaner and smaller and this cleanser has helped so much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser for two weeks and I’m noticing a positive improvement in my skin’s texture and pigmentation.  You can see the diffusion of the hyperpigmentation at the top of my forehead in the before and after pics.   I have been doing a double-cleanse by starting with the Tata Harper Regenerating Exfoliating Cleanser and following up with the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser.  I have to say that they are a great duo - where the exfoliating cleanser is applied to a dry face and acts as a polish, this cleanser follows up with an application to damp skin and has a lasting, cooling/calming effect.   The scent of this cleanser is earthy, reminiscent of aloe vera and essential oils, which I don’t love, but am happy to report rinses away without lingering. My skin is left feeling smooth and looking soft and touchable.  This cleanser did not cause any sort of irritation, even on my eczema prone skin, and did not require any adjustment period for results.  While I may not purchase this as a stand alone cleanser, it was the perfect pairing with the exfoliating cleanser also by Tata Harper. A match made in skincare heaven!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Tata Harper Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser with BHA & AHA for Redness and was impressed! I'm a huge fan of foaming cleansers as the bubbles make me feel cleaner. This cleanser was super easy to use and did not irritate my skin at all. Thanks to calming botanical ingredients within the product, it helps reduce redness. On the days that I wake up to super red checks, I quickly use this cleanser in my morning routine and notice the redness fades fairly quickly. There is a slight lemony scent to this cleanser which isn't super strong but might be a bit much for those looking for a fragrance free option. I also use this cleanser and target my T zone as I'm super oily and prone to acne there. I've noticed this to cleanse but not strip my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who struggles with oily skin, this cleanser does a great job of keeping my skin comfortably matte without drying it out. The lather is super rich and creamy and penetrates deep within my pores for an extra deep cleanse that removes all traces of dirt, makeup and pollution. The glycolic acid does a great job of ridding my face of dead skin giving my skin a smoother and brighter appearance. The salicylic acid is a great bonus as it helps to keep my acne at bay. My one critique of this product and the reason I took a star off, is for the smell. I can normally deal with any kind of scent but this smells like kitchen cleaner/polish on a nuclear level. Just a heads up for anyone that is sensitive to that kind of thing. Despite that, this cleanser is great to have in any skincare arsenal for a super deep cleanse, especially for us oily girls and guys!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser was an absolute game changer for my skincare routine. The ingredients include things like prickly pear flower enzymes, wildcrafted Juniper fruit, and Chlorella. These ingredients together created a powerful yet gentle foaming Gel Cleanser that exfoliated my skin, gave me a healthy glow and definitely lighten my dark spots. I absolutely love the fragrance this product has, it's almost like a sweet jet floral scent that really enhance the experience when applying and rinsing off the product. The packaging itself is very luxurious I love seeing the Frosted green glass bottle on my bathroom shelf. It can sometimes be hard to find products they have clean ingredients, are cruelty free, have no fillers, and that work extremely well. Without a doubt one of my favorite cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is awesome! I really love the packaging and the attention to detail on the bottle. I really love how easy to use this is and it has a nice lather on it and is easy to wipe off. I love that my skin feels clean but doesn’t feel stripped after. My skin is left with a nice glow and very soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser by Tata Harper really cleans deep down. This Clarifying Cleanser gets deep down into your pores and gets all the dirt and pollutions that can build up from your day.   This cleanser is gentle but effective. The prickly pear enzymes exfoliate, while the juniper fruit help remove the oil and balance your PH. The chlorella calms the skin and helps remove any redness.   There’s no toxins or fillers and it’s cruelty free. It’s a 100 percent natural. Theres no fake stuff included.   Pros: deep cleansing, cleans pores deep down  Cons: no cons I have found  Overall, this cleanser is great for an everyday cleanser especially if you’re prone to blemishes. It helps to lessen the look of big pores. It reduces redness and helps to reduce the look of an oily face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and I will admit this is truly a must try and a must haves . I love that it really cleanse  dead cells and impurities. I felt like my skin improve by simply trying it for a couple of weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a new face wash from Tata Harper out for about two weeks on my oily and combination skin; I do live in a dry climate and travel often to more humid places, and this held up really well in both climates. It doesn't dry out my skin and feels freshing both during the washing and afterwards; it feels hydrating without adding oil to my skin. It did sting my eyes a bit but I avoided getting too close to my eyes after the first use. It smells amazing and the bottle has a lux feeling that elevates my shower. The pump is also really nice but all of Tata Harpers products have really nice packaging. My skin didn't have that dry or tight feeling after toweling off and I wasn't rushing to put on moisturizer as soon as I was done with my shower. I also used this face wash at night a few times after my oil cleansing and it held up great with my nighttime products as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For a clarifying cleanser, I was expecting my skin to be stripped and was super relieved when that wasn’t the case. I use thick creams and balms on my face during the winter because I have dry skin. I love this cleanser because my skin felt and looked clean but didn’t feel dry to the touch. As always, I loved the Tata Harper signature scent it awakens my senses in the morning. The vibrant green gel consistency is so satisfying, and it lathers up nicely. The ingredients in this cleanser are natural and great for people with oily and acne-prone skin. Though I don’t have any of those problems, I benefited the most from the non-stripping foaming agents derived from the roots of vegetables since I have sensitive and dry skin. This is, overall, a good product to have in my stash when I need to get a good cleanse in, but I wouldn’t recommend it for everyday use if you have dry and dull skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is really good. It is a gell like cleanser with a green tint. It foams but not too much. If you have oily skin you would absolutely love this cleanser. Don't get freaked out by the color It is actually really good. It comes in a glass bottle though incase you were wondering. Oh and it has an ingredient that makes you slightly more sun sensitive so wear sunscreen if you are using it outside. But it's pretty good! .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily skin and am very acne prone. When I got the chance to try this cleanser I was very excited because it’s from a reputable brand and the ingredients sounded great. This product did not disappoint. I used it a good amount of times and feel like my skin has gotten clearer especially on my cheeks. My husband even said my skin has been looking much clearer and more vibrant- he wanted to know what I was using as his skin type is the same as mine as he was impressed with the results. Overall this product is excellent for acne prone skin and those with oily skin especially in the T zone area. It’s not harsh at all and I like to lather it for a long time to get all the ingredients penetrated into my skin and fully absorbed. The product lathers up nicely and you only need one pump so this bottle will go a long way. Overall I highly recommend it if you want a solid prodit that helps with reducing skin imperfections.

I tried the clarifying cleanser by Tata Harper and really liked it for my pores and also my texture.    It contains salicylic acid and glycolic acid.  It is still super gentle on my skin.  I love that it is also vegan and also contains herbs and plants.    the cleanser is in a glass pump.  I like that it’s easy to use and also dispense.  I find that my skin feels soft and also clean.  It is great to use when my skin feels dull and also makes it glow and not dry out.    I like that brand for the clean and gentle skincare.  My skin feels good and also the cleanser doesn’t make me breakout.  I love that it is not drying.  Overall it works well for my skincare routine.  I like it and recommend giving it a try.  I have combination dry skin and this works well for me

reviews.review_title: Cleans and clarifies without stripping your skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser every other night and I SO look forward to the nights I use this cleanser. Tata Harper is reknown for using organic/natural ingredients and the truth of that is obvious when you use this cleanser. First the smell is absolutely divine! I'm normally not a huge fan of scented skincare products but this one hooked me with its gorgeous, fresh scent the first time I tried it. I will say it felt a bit odd at first since the instructions say to apply to dry skin but the way my skin felt so refreshed and clean afterward made me fall in love. I have definitely noticed a decrease in redness and a marked improvement in congestion. I know this sounds cliche because every company that makes cleansers makes this claim but it really DOES clean my skin of makeup and sunscreen and it does so without stripping my skin and destroying my skin barrier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As an esthetician who still seems to struggle with her own problematic skin, this cleanser seems to be one that I’m highly impressed with! I like how it doesn’t seem to dry out my skin too terribly. It is winter here, so I have been noticing just regular dryness overall. I don’t think it’s the cleansers fault. This works on my pores (which I always seem to need help with) and targets my acne spots. With regular use, I have noticed a difference in my complexion. My pores seem to be more cleaned out, my acne seems to have lessened, and my skin overall looks healthier. I really like this cleanser and will be recommending this one to my clients! The only issue I will probably run into is the price point. It’s hard to justify a cleanser that is in the higher price range.

reviews.review_title: Great for oily skin and acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for the last 2 weeks and I really, really love it.  It took me through my hormonal week, when I get some acne, so nicely- I was really impressed. It does mattify your skin a little, so if you use a light moisturizer after, it will actually help control oil. The active ingredients for blemish control are awesome- which is why it works.  Prickly Pear Enzymes, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, and Salicylic Acid- all from plant sources.  That's why Tata is the best.   It has a smooth texture, and foams a little when you wash with it- it is sulfate free.   I have been in the beauty industry for 21 years, and am a product junkie. In my opinion, blemish/oil control products are either stripping, or not effective.  This one really is comfortable and effective.   Bonus it looks beautiful next to my sink and smells good: ) White shirt before, black after.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There are plenty of products out there that promise to clear skin and reduce redness. But none of them have delivered for me the way Tata Harper’s Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser has. This foaming gel cleanser is derived from natural ingredients like cassava tapioca and Mojave yucca and is 100% sulfate free. It only takes two pumps of products for me to clean my entire face and some of the results can be seen instantly; namely the immediate mattifying effect and a noticeable difference in the redness of my face. And in the two weeks I’ve been using it I haven’t dealt with a single blemish. It has a pleasant, earthy smell and rinses away clean. But heads up, I recommend using it before brushing your teeth because no matter what I do the “taste” invades my mouth and has to be brushed away. Also worth noting that it can make your skin more sensitive to the sun so best practice is to use an SPF and protective clothing when going out.

reviews.review_title: Leaves Skin Feeling Refreshed And Rejuvenated
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is a gel cleanser that kind of gives a cooling sensation when you apply it to your face. Once you begin rubbing it in, it foams well and feels gentle on my skin. After using this product, it really does leave my skin feeling clean and hydrated. It has a pleasant woodys/earthy/citrus scent. I personally have combination skin and when I use the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser my skin just feels refreshed and rejuvenated. I keep finding myself reaching for this product because I know it’s targeting my blemishes and redness. It doesn’t leave my skin feeling tight or stripped if anything it leaves it feeling calm and clean. If you are looking for a face wash that leaves you with a natural glow this should definitely be one on your must try list!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the clarifying cleanser from Tata Harper and here are my thoughts.  My skin isn’t perfect and has had impurities on my skin at times.  I’ve used other products in the past, but either my impurities don’t disappear or they disappear albeit briefly.  However after using this product, I don’t think I can use any other product again.  The directions to use the cleanser was easy and straightforward.  I feel that when I apply the cleanser, I can feel that deep cleanliness on my face.  After I rinse my face and neck, that deep cleanliness feeling stays on for many hours at a time, and it feels great not to have dry skin.  I also like that the product is certified vegan and is cruelty free.  With me being an animal lover and a vegan-in-progress, I find this commendable and want to support Tata Harper as much as I can.  The smell is stronger than I would like it to be.  However, it is not stopping me from using the product.  After a while, you get used to it and you almost not notice it.  I recommend this product to anyone that wants a deep clean skin, and feel great about themselves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using it for about two weeks, I like it but I don’t exactly love it.  So I’ve been using the cleanser at night and using the regenerating cleanser in the morning to try and get my skin from looking dull. During the winter months I tend to have more of a combination skin type so I try and use less products that are for oil control. This cleanser is so invigorating  on the skin. I was not expecting that feeling from a cleanser and it took me by surprise on the first use. It’s like a refreshing but almost minty feeling on the skin, I remove by eye makeup with another cleanser because I’m just scared quite truthfully to put it anywhere near my eyes.  The cleanser isn’t harsh on my skin. It leaves me with a face feeling so clean, soft and just fresh. I tested this cleanser out with makeup and no makeup.  With makeup I feel like it did a good job of doing oil control leaving me with fresh looking makeup for a while. Without makeup it kept my face oil free for almost 5 hours. I’m still surprised about that. It did leave my skin feeling a little too tight but again it could be because tend to not be as oily during the winter months. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been great for my very sensitive skin, it has a very good blend of active ingredients and nourishing ones to ensure not to be drying when applying onto my skin, I have used this product on a daily basis for these past two weeks and have seen significant improvements in my complexion. I have always loved Tata Harper’s formula when developing and using their products and I feel the care and quality of the ingredients they use on each formulation is really great. As someone who struggles with acne-prone skin I have really loved the results with this product and the aroma when using it is extremely calming and very fitting to the brand, it is very hard to find a product that works and doesn’t dry my sensitive skin, this cleanser is definitely added to my must-haves!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry/combination and sensitive skin, yet redness and enlarged pores, I always have a hard time finding cleansers. This one did the trick. It left me skin feeling renewed, energized, and invigorated. I enjoyed the texture and how it felt on my skin. It did have a pleasant floral scent. It also worked really well to clean my pores, help with areas of excess oil, and decrease redness. Overall very pleased with the results I've seen thus far. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking to try a new cleanser. Additionally, the glass bottle design makes it feel luxurious and special. I loved how it went with the rest of my skincare routine and the bottle was very functional. You will love this if you're a Tata Harper fan. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser for two weeks now. The green gel texture feels light and cooling on the skin, making it perfect for mornings or after a long day. I use it daily, and it cleanses pretty well without leaving my combination skin feeling dry or tight, or oily or greasy.  The salicylic acid works wonders for clearing out my pores and keeping breakouts at bay, especially the pesky blackheads I get on my left cheek and around my mouth and chin area. I’ve noticed that my skin feels smoother, and my redness looks significantly calmer. It has a subtle minty herbal, yet woodsy scent that feels very natural and soothing. My skin tingled from the cooling sensation. One of the best things about this cleanser is that it doesn’t just treat blemishes; it also helps balance my oil production, leaving my skin looking fresher and more even, and feeling soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is a popular skincare product known for its natural and organic ingredients. It is designed to gently cleanse the skin while targeting blemishes and congestion. The formula includes ingredients such as willow bark extract, probiotics, and essential oils to help clarify and balance the skin.  I have noticed positive results after using the  Clarifying Cleanser, noting improvements in my skin's clarity and texture. The cleanser effectively removes impurities without stripping my skin of its natural oils, leaving my skin feeling clean and refreshed. I have combination dry skin and love the way it cleans my skin without it feeling stripped or tight. The foam lather is also very pleasant and makes for a nice face washing experience.   Overall, the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is gentle yet effective and I recommended it for those looking to address blemishes and maintain clear, balanced skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is great for people who are experiencing breakout and have acne prone skin. I feel like the ingredients are very calming like calendula and made my skin feel at peace. I would definitely use this product if you are looking for a reset. I have even used it as a spot treatment and the pimple went down. The redness was subdued. It is more of a traditional cleanser with needing to be applied on wet skin. I liked that. The product came across as tried and true. My skin did not feel stripped once I rinsed the cleanser off. It was gentle on my skin. The congestion in my skin went away by using the product for only a few days. I love the natural scent and aesthetically pleasing glass bottle that it comes in. It gives luxury skin care and is a delight to see in my bathroom.

reviews.review_title: Didn’t bother my dry and sensitive skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is said to work best for oily and acne-prone skin which at first scared me to use it as someone with dry and sensitive skin. So I used it only every other day, specially during the times that I was purging from the mask and this definitely worked! It calmed my skin and addressed the blemishes I had at that time. It might be dry to the skin after use but with proper after care it did not bother me. Made sure that my hydration regimen after cleansing was on point and it worked beautifully. It still has the natural a bit citrus scent that Tata harper products have but it is not as refreshing of a smell as the regenerating cleanser. I love that it is easy to spot the difference between cleansers even with just how the liquid looks like. Love the bottle the cleansers come in with as it is very beautiful to have at the bathroom counters. Knowing that a product they made best for oily skin worked well for me just made my admiration to the brand more and more. Looking forward to trying more from this brand and would spread the word about its effects on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Review for Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser  The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is an impressive product tailored for blemish-prone and oily skin. Its lightweight gel formula feels refreshing on the skin and provides a cooling sensation that is both soothing and invigorating. Packed with natural and organic ingredients, this cleanser not only targets impurities but also helps to reduce redness and calm irritated skin.

reviews.review_title: The perfect cleanser for acne prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As the weather has turned colder my oily skin has gotten even more oily. My acne has gone from mild to severe. This clarifying cleanser has helped to improve my skin a lot. It contains salicylic acid and glycolic acid which work together to help gently improve my skins texture. It has a light scent. The texture is very smooth and creamy. It applies easily on dry skin and foams up with water. It rinsed off without much effort. I like to use this daily in the evening as the first step to my skincare routine or after prepping my skin with micellar water. I really like following this with a clarifying moisturizer to help hydrate my skin. I appreciate that the ingredients are of the highest quality. The packaging is beautiful and easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really liking the feel of this cleanser, it has a nice texture of a lightweight slippery gel with a soft lather. The smell is from the botanical ingredients but I’m still not a huge fan of smelling essential oils in skincare because that’s still fragrance, and thus, can be a sensitivity trigger, for some. I do love seeing honey, high up, in the ingredients list; It’s calming, hydrating and antibacterial, a perfect ingredient in skincare for any skin type. Paired with other botanicals like willow bark (salicylic acid) wintergreen, this really helps inflammation due to the overproduction of bacteria harboring sebum in the skin. I can really see myself getting much more use out of it in the warmer months, with the clarifying moisturizer, because of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin with an oily t zone, normal cheeks, and the rest is a bit dry. Since I am also acne prone, I have to be careful about which products I use. This cleanser has a lot of nice ingredients such as pricly pear flower enzymes to help exfoliate, wild crafted juniper fruit to help with my overproduction of oil and chlorella to help nourish my dry zones. When I put it on my skin, I have to make sure my face is nice and wet to create a good lather. I then work it into the skin for at least a minute to make sure all these great ingredients have time to give me benefits.  I really like the smell of this cleanser, and it gives me a refreshing feeling when I wash it off. I have not had irritation or breakouts from this cleanser. As a matter of fact, it has helped with the tiny red bumps I just had a few days ago as they have now gone away. I recommend this cleanser to those who are acne prone or have really oily skin.

reviews.review_title: A Luxurious, Effective Cleanser That Delivers Resu
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper’s Clarifying Cleanser has completely exceeded my expectations. I’ve tried numerous cleansers, but this one stands out as truly exceptional. It features a vibrant green gel-like texture that feels luxurious and silky on the skin. When applied, it glides effortlessly, creating a smooth, slippery sensation that makes the cleansing experience enjoyable and indulgent.  The scent is herbal with a subtle hint of lemon citrus. While the herbal notes are more pronounced, they’re not overpowering, adding a natural and refreshing touch.  What truly sets this cleanser apart is its performance. You apply it directly to dry skin, and it works wonders—even on makeup. I tested it on a full face of makeup, including mascara, and it removed everything effortlessly. It’s just as effective as Tata Harper’s oil cleanser, which I also love, making it difficult to choose between the two. The cleanser removes every trace of dirt, makeup, and impurities, leaving my skin thoroughly cleansed without any dryness or tightness.  Beyond cleansing, this product enhances my skin’s natural glow. Each use leaves my complexion looking healthy, radiant, and refreshed. The high-quality formulation lives up to Tata Harper’s luxurious reputation, delivering a transformative experience with every use.  If you’re on the fence about adding this to your routine, I highly recommend it. Whether you’re a fan of gel cleansers or looking for an alternative to an oil cleanser, this product is a game-changer. It’s easily one of my favorite cleansers, and I’ll be reaching for it again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The **Tata Harper Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser** is a must-try for those with oily, combination, or blemish-prone skin. Powered by natural BHAs and AHAs, this gel-based cleanser targets excess oil, congestion, and redness effectively while maintaining a gentle touch. The lightweight formula lathers beautifully and rinses clean, leaving the skin refreshed without feeling stripped.  Its standout feature is its ability to reduce redness and soothe irritation, thanks to calming botanical ingredients. Over time, it helps refine pores, smooth texture, and balance oil production, making it an excellent choice for those seeking a clearer, more even complexion. The natural, non-toxic ingredients are a hallmark of Tata Harper’s commitment to clean beauty, which is ideal for those prioritizing skincare with no harsh chemicals.   Though the price is premium, the results and luxurious experience make it worth considering for anyone looking to upgrade their routine with a high-performance, skin-loving cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time Esti and Skincare lover who has worked in both clinical and high end retail settings Tata Harper is a brand I know and love. This brand is not only luxurious inside and out they have high performance, quality ingredients at levels that are safe for the every day consumer but effective enough to use in a spa room. Tata Harper uses natural ingredients with a focus on being gentle to even the most sensitive skin. I tried the Clarifying Cleanser and honestly, it couldn't have come at a better time! My skin is a little angry right now - or as the packaging says... troubled lol. I have been getting some uncharacteristic break outs and I think its a culmination of stress, working overtime and running out of exfoliant. This cleanser is green in color, a gel consistency and does have a strong scent - I would not call the scent a fragrance as I think it is just due to the ingredients - personally I like the smell it's kinda grassy/earthy. Ingredients at the top of the list that I love to see are honey, willow bark and arnica - these are all great at calming breakouts, controlling bacteria and healing! I would recommend this to anyone who is experiencing some breakouts or looking for a good clean feel without feeling too tight or stripped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper’s Regenerating Cleanser is a great choice for someone looking for a high-quality, all-natural skincare experience. This is a gentle sulfate-free cleanser, it’s a very natural wash that is a combination of Cassava, Tapioca, and Wild Harvested Mojave Yucca. I noticed that it left my skin so smooth, radiant, and very refreshed. It has a creamy, soft texture that glides nicely onto the skin. It does a great job removing dirt and grime without stripping moisture. It has a fresh, botanical scent. Using it makes it feel like I'm having an at-home spa treatment. I love that it is packed with very natural ingredients leaving my skin healthy and glowing. It has been a perfect addition to my skincare and I would highly recommend this cleanser!  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good skin care is hard to come by these days. I am a 28 year old woman who loves to be out in the sun. With that hobby, comes consequences. I do my best to apply sunscreen and take care of my skin, but finding a cleanser that isn’t too harsh, yet works is a different story. Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser works so well and smells amazing! You can feel the clean after you use it. It is a little on the pricey side, but it’s definitely worth it in my personal opinion. My face has never felt so clean and taken care of. Not to mention, the bottle just looks so classy and elegant in my bathroom. I will say that it took me about five minutes to figure out how to get the pump to work. So you just have to press down on the tab. I was so scared to break it that I wasn’t sure and had to look it up so I will save you guys the trouble.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is a powerhouse for anyone struggling with breakouts or congestion.   This cooling, gel-based cleanser targets blemish-prone skin and balances oil production while gently cleansing impurities. The natural salicylic acid helps to exfoliate and unclog pores, while the lactic acid refines skin texture without drying out my skin.  I appreciate how this cleanser is the perfect balance between being effective and gentle. It deeply cleanses to reduce excess oil and prevent breakouts but doesn't leave my skin feeling stripped or tight at all. The blend of botanical extracts like arnica, calendula, and chlorella provides soothing and anti-inflammatory benefits, making this cleanser a good fit even for my often-irritated skin.  I’ve only just started using this cleanser, but I’m excited to see how my oily and acne-prone skin improves over time.   Overall, the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is a fantastic addition for anyone dealing with oily and acne-prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was immediately drawn to the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser because of its clean ingredients and beautiful glass bottle that feels so luxurious. The scent is distinctly natural and earthy—it really smells like a blend of pure, green botanicals. The foaming gel consistency works great for my combination skin, leaving it feeling clean and refreshed without any tightness or dryness.  The cleanser has a nice formula with natural salicylic acid and AHAs that help exfoliate and clear out impurities. It’s gentle, so even though it tackles oil and blemishes, it doesn’t leave my skin feeling stripped. The prickly pear enzymes and juniper fruit feel like they’re doing good work balancing oil, and I didn’t experience any irritation. Plus, the chlorella adds a nourishing element to keep my skin calm.  After using it, my skin felt nice—smooth and matte—but I didn’t notice any dramatic changes right away in terms of blemishes or pore size. It’s similar to other cleansers I’ve used in that sense. However, I appreciate how it’s free of toxins and cruelty-free, which makes me feel good about using it daily.  While it didn’t deliver immediate, wow-worthy results for me, it’s still a solid cleanser for everyday use, especially if you’re looking for something natural and gentle. I’d give it 4 stars because it’s a good product, just not groundbreaking in terms of instant results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the clarifying cleanser by Tata Harper and enjoyed my experience.    It’s hard to find good cleansers that are gentle and effective on cleansing the skin.  I have combination oily skin and some times dry patches too.  My skin feels cleaned and clear after using it.  I also love that it lathers really well and moisturizes my skin without stripping the moisture.    After using this cleanser I like that my pores cleared up and it feels less congested.  I enjoyed using the bottle, it feels luxurious with the glass bottle and pump.    It is also nice to know it’s a clean beauty brand and there’s no toxic ingredients in this.    Overall I enjoyed using this cleanser and also clearing my skin.  I would recommend giving this a try if you’re looking for a good cleanser  This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_title: My oily acne prone skin is loving this cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this clarifying cleanser. I have oily aprone skin, and this cleanser is targeted for problematic skin. So what's not to love about this cleanser, in my opinion is amazing. It has this gel texture that turns into a foam. It has a lovely herbal scent. You have to shake well before using. It leaves my skin feeling and looking clean and with a matte finish without stripping the skin. It feels like it deep cleanses the pores, I did not experience a lot of new breakouts. My problematic area right now is my neck, and the blemishes seem to be less irritated. Love the packaging. It comes in this green glass bottle that looks beautiful and elegant. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Glycolic acid and salicylic acid are main ingredients against acne. This powerful cleanser features both and targets acne causing dirt and bacteria while also balancing oil for a matte complexion. It also has chlorella in it for soothing redness and calming irritated skin therefore it is suitable for sensitive skin too! It contains prickly pear fruit enzymes to trigger the skin's natural cell renewal process. I recommend it for oily and combination skin, for those who are prone to acne. It is best to use it day and night. I love the smooth texture because it really highlights my skincare routine. My acneic skin has improved so much since I swapped out my cleanser to this. I have not had any acne in a while. Redness and irritation are also gone!

reviews.review_title: Problematic Skin, Say Hello to Your New Staple
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm Ki, a freelance businesswoman in my mid-30s and skincare lover since my teens, when I finally said enough to my problematic skin. The scent of Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is herbal, medicinal, like a buffet of plant remedies to feed and nourish your skin. The cleanser gives a good lather and leaves my face feeling cleansed and oil-free while not overly dried out. As I aged into my late 20s, and now in my mid-30s, I struggle with pores, texture, and blemishes more than I ever did as a teenager. This clarifying cleanser for problematic skin is working overtime to heal my skin, targeting blemish-causing impurities. I wish my before picture was right before starting use instead of a few days ahead, because I broke out like crazy -- BIG zits on both cheeks, my forehead, above my lips -- and this cleanser cleared me up almost entirely in a week in combination with the exfoliating cleanser. I'm adding it to my routine, no question. The bottle design evokes timeless class. I have no other product in my master bath, despite having other luxury brands, which is as aesthetically pleasing as the Tata Harper packaging. I like that the design is such that you can instantly see how much product is left with the see-through glass bottle. I am moving much more toward eco-friendly packaging and containers, and glass will always have more recyclability than plastic, another win for Tata Harper. Vegetarian, cruelty-free, and Forest Stewardship Council approved packaging. For all skin types. It does contain AHA, so be diligent with your sunscreen. Next-generation skincare, indeed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the brand, Tata Harper. It is such a luxury brand that I am very fortunate in getting to experience. This Tara Harper clarifying cleanser is very gentle on the skin so it is not over drying. This clarifying cleanser is marketed for problematic skin. I have combination skin which tends to lean oily during the summer and dry during the winter. Lately I have been suffering from whiteheads that I have no idea how they are appearing. I believe this clarifying cleanser from Tata Harper has been helping a lot in treating and preventing future outbreaks on my skin. This cleanser is smooth and has an earthy scent to it. now that I am in my 40s I have been really appreciating what is put into my products so I am very happy that Tata Harper only uses natural ingredients. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try the Tata Harper Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser with BHA & AHA for Redness. My overall first impression was it is a gentle and effective cleanser. After using it daily for a week I absolutely loved how my skin felt. The packaging is gorgeous and expensive feeling heavy glass. The product is also a luxurious non- foaming gel. It wasn’t drying or exfoliating and the scent is just lovely and fresh/fruity. I noticed more even tone and texture and a brighter overall appearance even after the first use. The size of the bottle is very generous, and it is packaged well with a pump as well. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a gentle, yet effective exfoliating high-end face cleanser. The brand is clean as well, it doesn’t get any better than this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a powerful cleanser that works well on my skin. I do find it's best used in the shower, as it requires wet skin and creates quite a significant lather that's not as easy to rinse off in the sink. It's also notably one you have to make sure you are using with a SPF moisturizer or sunscreen given some of the ingredients (the alpha hydroxy acid) can make your skin extra-sensitive to the sun. The smell is pleasant and not overpowering, and I appreciate the array of primarily natural ingredients and the certifications (cruelty free, vegetarian) and the dermatologic testing. It comes in a classic, attractive green bottle that looks great in my shower cabinet, and dispenses easily with clear instructions on its use. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have very oily, acne-prone skin. I try to stay clear of any products that may be too abrasive for my skin or clog my pores.  This bottle is elegant and environmentally-friendly. It screams luxury. You can tell it is very high quality. I also really appreciate the earthy scent it gives off.  This cleanser does a good job cleaning in a gentle manner that allows for it to be used daily. It doesnt strip away thr skin. However, I'm afraid this cleanser is clogging my pores leading to further acne breakouts. My skin has had far more blemishes since using this brand.  I would recommend this for people that enjoy earthy scents and are not prone to acne. I also would advise against pregnant women from taking this as it contains willow which is similar to salicylic acid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and this helps balance it. cleans and smoothes my skin. The only thing I'm not big on is the scent of this one, it's earthy scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and I love the way this made my skin feel! My skin felt very fresh and not stripped but not overly hydrated either. I do think it gives the matte finish it claims. I can see how this would be a good fit for oily and acne prone skin. It's a really nice gel cleanser consistency that easily suds up. It does have a rather strong medicinal/eucalyptus/menthol type of scent that does linger on the skin. I don't mind it but others might. The packaging is very luxe and feel fancy but it makes me nervous having glass in the shower as I'm clumsy. While I think this is very nice, I don't think it performs significantly better than most other affordable cleansers. I am going to enjoy using this up but I do not plan on repurchasing just due to the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is great for combination type skin since some areas on my face are oily and others dry and I love a more matte type of skin look. I also have redness in areas as well so I needed a product that could help all those issues in one and this product is it. This helped make the oily spots in my face more matte like and help conceal and heal the more red and acne spots that I have. This is the perfect product to help balance out skin to get it looking and feeling a more all over even type appearance. Not only does this work great on skin but it's gentle and made with good ingredients that don't cause any issues so no need to worry about what your putting on your face! This review was collected as part of a promotion

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this, and let me just say—it’s a total game changer for my blemish-prone skin! From the first wash, I noticed how effectively it targets impurities and balances oil, leaving my skin feeling fresh and clean without any tightness. The natural foaming action means I’m getting a gentle cleanse without the harsh sulfates.  Using this product is super simple. I massage 2 pumps onto my damp skin and watch the bubbles work their magic. After rinsing with warm water, my skin feels so much clearer and looks visibly healthier! I even love using it as a quick cooling mask—just a minute or two, and it gives my complexion a refreshing boost.  The packaging is spring-inspired, making it a lovely addition to my skincare routine. Overall, this foaming gel cleanser is a must-have for anyone struggling with blemish-prone skin. It leaves my skin feeling perfectly balanced and looking clearer than ever! I’m definitely sticking with it! 💦✨  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skin care professional that struggles with oily skin with clogged pores and skin texture, I always look for a cleanser that helps remedy my skin's oil production without completely stripping away its natural oils. The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is the perfect cleanser to add to one’s skincare routine if they were seeking to manage overactive sebaceous glands. It is a foaming cleanser that will help aid in blemish prevention and balance oil production in the skin. My troubled skin is blemish prone, textured, and I have dark spots from acne scarring. I also struggle with high skin sensitivity when testing out new products but I can confirm that this cleanser is gentle and does not cause irritation to my skin. I must note that this product increases sensitivity to sunlight so a word of caution is to always protect your skin by wearing sunscreen in your best interest. This product does not completely mattify my skin but it does a great job at slowing down the oil production and preventing my skin from looking greasy at its normal 2-3 hour mark after leaving the house. Please ignore the red spot on my lower lip area that is a mosquito bite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm used to using acids on my face for my severe acne in the last and large pores, so this cleanser is amazing for me and works well. I was surprised that I didn't find this to be that hard or stripping for me. Yes, initially it did tingle a bit and cause some sensitivity but then it was normal. I was using this 2 times a week due to it being quite strong. I love using this when I have really bad acne flare ups and this calms my skin down and reduces the breakouts in size. I love the consistency and the feel of this cleanser. The packaging and the scent of this is also really nice. I personally thought this worked well for my skin and didn't really cause any irritation or reaction. I still wouldn't use this on a daily basis, it's okay to use this every 2 or 3 days days. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been trying out the Tata Harper Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser, and I’ve gotta say, it's made a noticeable difference for my skin. This one’s specifically for oily or breakout-prone skin, and it really gets the job done without being too harsh. The formula has BHA and AHA, which work wonders for keeping my pores clear and my skin balanced.  The texture is more of a lightweight gel, and it feels super refreshing when you apply it. What I love most is that even though it’s deep-cleaning, it doesn’t strip my skin or leave me feeling dry or tight afterward. It’s been really helpful in controlling the oil around my T-zone, especially when things get shiny during the day.  After using it consistently, my skin looks less congested, and the redness I usually get from breakouts has calmed down. It also has this calming effect with a slight tingly feeling, which makes me feel like it’s really working. I’ve noticed that my skin stays clearer longer, and I’m not breaking out as much either.  If you’re looking for a cleanser that targets oil and breakouts but still feels gentle, this one is a must-try. It’s perfect for getting that deep clean without drying out your skin!

reviews.review_title: A Staple for the Clean Beauty Gurus
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foaming gel cleanser is a game-changer for those with oily and combination skin types. Designed to target blemish-causing impurities, this formulation combines natural salicylic acid and AHAs to effectively tackle acne, blemishes, pores, and excessive oiliness. The end result? Clear, comfortably matte skin that radiates a healthy glow.  Upon testing this product, I was impressed by its ability to deeply cleanse the skin without causing dryness or irritation. The gentle foaming action leaves the skin feeling refreshed and purified, making it a delightful addition to any skincare routine.  In terms of performance, the Tata Harper Clarifying Pore & Oil Control Cleanser delivers on its promises. With continued use, I noticed a visible reduction in blemishes and a more balanced complexion. The inclusion of BHA and AHA ensures a thorough exfoliation, helping to unclog pores and refine skin texture over time. I was stressed at the end of my trial so I did have some stress acne but I have no doubts that this product will help me tackle that also.  Overall, I would recommend this cleanser to individuals who are looking to address specific skincare concerns such as acne, blemishes, and excess oiliness. It is a reliable companion for those seeking a targeted solution that promotes clear and radiant skin. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has struggled for 15+ years with acne and blemishes, I love being able to try out new skincare. The Tara Harper clarifying cleanser really helps clear breakouts. I appreciate that this cleanser is specifically formulated for problematic skin. You can tell immediately that the ingredients are clean and after reading more about the brand it seems like they're organically sourced as well. $88 dollars for a cleanser is quite expensive, though you do get 4 ounces of product and the glass bottle it comes in is luxurious. It does have a scent that some may not appreciate, as it smells like herbs. Personally I don't mind the smell or the bright green color of the cleanser itself. Will continue to enjoy and use this clarifying cleanser daily.

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin so i really love to try all products designed for skin type to balance oil without drying. It has green color and so so much fresh smell of aromatic tone and botanical fragrance mint.  I gently scrubbed and massage on my face for 1 minute because the smell was so good. I did not need the warm water to rinse off because it was easy washed by cool water. My skin face felt so fresh, soft, smooth and plumping. The clarifying cleanser left my skin an aromatic scent and so cool mint last longer ever than others aroma products I have used before. I felt my skin deeper clean and so comfortable, the pore was tightened. My skin had no reaction to this cleanser. There is a recommendation to use Clarifying Cleanser as a flash cooling mask for 1 to 2 minutes to feel like home spa. I always trust products by Tata Harper brand. **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The clarifying cleanser is ideal for those who have oily skin and/or blemishes. Formulated with salicylic acid and AHAs, this is supposed to thoroughly cleanse the skin, control oil production, and prevent problematic blemishes. Fortunately, I don’t have neither of those skincare concerns, but I do experience enlarged pores and texture. I have noticed a reduction in the size of my pores since using this cleanser and surprisingly, it doesn’t exacerbate the dryness on my already dry skin. My skin feels refreshed, balanced, and clean every time after use. As for the formulation, the cleanser lathers well and the fresh scent provides a soothing, almost spa-like experience during cleansing. I have incorporated this product into my skincare regimen and use this once or twice a week to achieve a more brighter complexion.

reviews.review_title: Deep Cleansing and Balanced Skin with Tata Harper
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser for 2 weeks, I’m really impressed with the results. As someone with combination skin, this cleanser has done a fantastic job balancing oil and keeping my dry areas hydrated. The foaming formula, made from natural ingredients like cassava tapioca and Mojave yucca, feels gentle yet effective. Plus, the inclusion of AHA and BHA helps exfoliate without irritation.  My skin looks clearer, pores are less visible, and breakouts have decreased. The cleanser leaves my skin feeling fresh without the dryness. Overall, it's a great choice for anyone looking for a natural, sulfate-free cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a first timer to this brand, I can say that I am blown away. From the packaging to the scent, this brand screams luxury. The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser comes in a beautiful green glass jar. It is made specifically for pore and oil control. As someone with oily skin, I need all the help I can get. The scent is heavenly and smells very earthy. The cleanser contains AHAs and BHAs which help control oil without drying out the skin. I use this daily and make sure to follow up with sunscreen during the day. My skin always feels good afterwards and never dried out. I really appreciate how clean my skin feels after using this. I will continue to purchase this cleanser as it has become one of my favorite parts of my routine! I highly recommend to everyone with oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using TATA HARPER’s Clarifying Cleanser for a few weeks now, and it's quickly become my go-to for clearer, balanced skin. This gel cleanser is formulated specifically for blemish-prone skin, and it delivers a refreshing, cooling sensation upon application, thanks to its natural mint and eucalyptus blend. The texture is lightweight, and it lathers nicely without stripping my skin. After regular use, I noticed fewer breakouts and reduced redness, and my skin feels more balanced overall. The clean, non-toxic ingredients are a huge bonus, making it a guilt-free choice for skincare. It is a bit on the expensive side, but considering the noticeable improvement in my complexion, it’s worth the splurge for those dealing with oily or acne-prone skin.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In the realm of skincare, Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is genuinely revolutionary. This  cleanser efficiently gets rid of extra oil and pollutants without dehydrating the skin. This cleanser's all-natural composition is one of its best qualities. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion.   Let me just preface this by saying, I have always struggled with fairly significant acne. The kind that never seems to go away, but is just enough there to be seen. My search for an adequate acne product has also been an incredible struggle, especially finding a product that also doesn’t dry my skin out. I have very dry skin to begin with, so I don’t need something else drying me out. However, I was pleasantly surprised when I found this one.   I initially was very excited and hopeful for this cleanser. If I’m being honest, I wanted to see results immediately (don’t we all?!). That just wasn’t the case. However, that doesn’t mean that I didn’t see results after multiple usage!   This clarifying cleanser is one of the most gentle yet effective acne cleanser I have ever used.  After using it for roughly 2 weeks or so, my skin has significantly cleared (see photos below). In addition, prior acne scars have also blurred and don’t stand out as much. My skin doesn’t feel as textured nor has occasional rough patches of skin. Instead my skin looks and feels so soft and radiant.   In addition, the cleanser itself lathers very well, and has a very nice cooling effect. It does have a bit of fragrance to it (more so a “clean” scent) but nothing that I personally find overpowering and bothersome. The pump and glass bottle is also a nice touch, and very functional. I would feel confident traveling with this cleanser if need be as the packaging feels very secure.   Overall, my experience with this cleanser was a good one. However, I would recommend that those who aren’t bothered by fragrances use this rather than the latter. The scent tends to be subtle, but I can imagine it isn’t as subtle to those with more sensitive skin. I also would recommend working your way up to 2 times a day. I made the mistake of using the cleanser twice a day at the beginning and truly believe using x1 a day may help transition your skin to this produc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: recently tried the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser, and overall, my experience was quite positive. Here's a detailed review based on my usage:  Packaging and Presentation: The cleanser comes in a sleek, green glass bottle with a pump dispenser, giving it a luxurious and eco-friendly feel. The pump dispenses the perfect amount of product, making it easy to use without any waste.  Texture and Scent: The cleanser has a gel-like consistency that feels light and refreshing on the skin. It has a mild, herbal scent, which is quite pleasant and not overpowering. The fragrance is likely due to the natural ingredients used in the formulation.  Ingredients: Tata Harper products are known for their natural and organic ingredients, and this cleanser is no exception. It contains a blend of salicylic acid, lactic acid, and a variety of botanical extracts aimed at clarifying and purifying the skin. The absence of synthetic chemicals and fragrances is a big plus for those with sensitive skin.  Effectiveness: Upon application, the cleanser produces a slight tingling sensation, which indicates that the active ingredients are working. After rinsing off, my skin feels clean, refreshed, and not stripped of its natural oils. Over a few weeks of consistent use, I noticed a reduction in the frequency and severity of breakouts. My pores also appeared smaller, and my overall complexion looked clearer and more balanced.  Hydration: Despite its clarifying properties, the cleanser does not leave my skin feeling dry or tight, which is often a concern with products targeting acne-prone skin. My skin felt adequately hydrated, making it suitable for daily use.  Conclusion: The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser delivers on its promise of clearer, healthier-looking skin. Its natural formulation, pleasant sensory experience, and effectiveness in reducing breakouts make it a standout product in the realm of luxury skincare. While the price point is high, the results justify the expense for those willing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I learned about the brand Tata Harper, I was really excited to try their Clarifying Cleanser. I have combination skin and struggle with breakouts, especially around my cycle, so I was really interested to see how this product would work for my skin. I really appreciate that Tata Harper’s products are vegetarian and cruelty-free. I also think that it’s really cool that it is made in Vermont and that some of the ingredients are organically farmed! I really liked that the cleanser has ingredients targeted at reducing the appearance of blemishes, like prickly pear enzymes, and ingredients to help balance oil, like cassava tapioca Mojave yucca root. The cleaner has a fairly noticeable fresh, herbal scent, so this might not be the best product for anyone sensitive to scents. It is a gel cleanser, and I found that it foamed and lathered nicely. I thought that this cleanser left my skin feeling clean, without drying it out or making it feel oily, which I really liked. I personally didn’t feel like I saw a very noticeable difference in my acne, but I have been dealing with a lot of stress, which could be contributing to it. I don’t think my acne has gotten worse, but I still have a few problem areas that haven’t shown much improvement. Overall, I do like this cleanser, and I plan to continue using it to see if it works better when I am not dealing with as much stress. I think this could be a good product for people who don’t mind scents and those who have oily/combination skin and acne.  * “This review was collected as part of a promotion”

So you're buying beauty products and they are doing damage you may not see for years and years and it's mostly to make shelf lives longer and gives things more texture et cetera and has nothing to do with the skin care itself. Harper Wanted to come up with a skincare solution that's truly good for your skin. She spent years of time working with products that the rest of the industry deemed too expensive or not worth the hassle etc. Living in such a beautiful place like Vermont. I know people say they get these results. But I'm truly seeing it every day. I feel so much better because I know what I'm washing my face with, doesn't have horrible for me Chemicals that have no place in beauty products. And I'm seeing the results I've always read about on boxes and wished I had but never got, but now it's actually happening! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed esthetician, I am always on the look out for new and innovative skincare products! I am loving the evolution of skincare to include more organic ingredients and plant-powered oils and extracts. I was pleasantly surprised when reviewing the ingredient deck for the Clarifying Cleanser! It is packed with extracts and ingredients like honey, willow bark, calendula, lavender, arnica, rosemary, and one of my favorites-elderberry! This cleanser works as a powerful decongestant, and it even has a very refreshing feeling thanks to the menthol in the ingredients. I really enjoyed the deliciously earthy and herbal scent of the cleanser every time I used it-something about it reminded me of some of the products we used at the Aveda esthetics institute that I studied at. I also am in love with the beautiful glass bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello I’m a 35 year old beauty enthusiast from northern Kentucky! Wow! This Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser has made my skin so silky smooth! This Clarifying Cleanser foams because of nature not synthetics.Its a gel foaming cleanser that targets impurities and balances oil for clear matte skin! It also has natural salicylic acid and Ahas for clearer skin! They don’t use sulfates, they use Cassava Tapioca and wild harvested Mojave Yucca.This cleanser is for oily to combination skin.Its also for Acne ,Blemishes,Pores, and Oiliness.The highlighted ingredients are …-Prickly Pear Flower Enzymes:Which exfoliates to encourage cell renewal and helps clear buildup to prevent blemishes without over drying. Next up is Wild Crafted Juniper Fruit: which helps to balance oil without disrupting the natural pH-balance or over-drying for a healthy looking complexion! Then last but not least it has Chlorella: Which helps nourish the skin to soothe redness and calm irritation, plus it gives the formula its signature green color! Truly is a amazing natural cleanser! I love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is one of those brands that I am proud to use because of its natural origins and this cleanser is one of the top products on my most favorites list. As someone who has oily/combination, sensitive, and rosacea-prone skin, this cleanser is perfect for clarifying and giving my skin a matte feel without drying it out. With lactic, citric, and salicylic acids to exfoliate my skin, I don’t feel like I have to exfoliate separately as much with this cleanser. The natural, herbally fragrance of this cleanser is amazing and I like to leave the cleanser on my skin for a few minutes to work its full magic. When I rinse it off, my skin is smooth, brightened, and plumped. For anyone looking for an amazing cleanser that is natural and purifying, look no further than this cleanser. Your skin will be so happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like other Tata Harper cleansers, Clarifying  Cleanser comes in a sturdy glass bottle with a convenient pump. The cleanser's texture is unique, resembling a watery yet stretchy consistency, similar to diluted egg white. Its scent and dark green color, reminiscent of algae, are a bit unusual, and might even be off-putting for some people. Clarifying Cleanser effortlessly transforms from being runny and stretchy to a thick creamy foam which gently cleanses without stripping the skin. Although it is formulated with natural salicylic acid and AHAs, it doesn’t dry out or irritate the skin. The cooling sensation after rinsing was unexpected but appreciated.   I found the cleanser especially effective during periods of hormonal or stress-induced breakouts, clearing my skin within a few days of use. While it may not become my daily go-to cleanser, I'll keep it on hand for managing blemishes and breakouts in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is a brand that focuses on using natural and organic ingredients in their products. I really like their cleansers that come in luxurious green glass bottles. The clarifying cleanser is green in color and has a gel-like texture. When applied to the face, it turns into a creamy white texture and lathers well when washed with water. It has a minty and earthy smell, but it's not my favorite scent. After using it, my skin is soft and bright, but due to the presence of AHA, it might cause a mild burning sensation. Therefore, I would not recommend it for daily use or to those with sensitive skin. Instead, I suggest using this cleanser for acne-prone skin or when you have blemish problems. In my case, since I have mostly clear skin, it won't be my go-to cleanser. However, having a cleanser with chemical exfoliants would benefit my skin's brightness if I use it once or twice a week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a licensed cosmetologist for over 25 years, specializing in skincare and professional makeup artistry. The packaging of this cleanser is nice with its sturdy glass bottle and easy  pump. The gel formula contains really great ingredients like Prickly Pear  Enzymes  and Chlorella to soothe.I did appreciate the texture as it transformed from a light gel to foam and the inclusion of  salicylic acid for cleaning out the pores.Despite having mature skin, I was pleasantly surprised. This cleanser didn't dry out my skin; instead, it felt invigorating, like a refreshing boost for my complexion. I particularly enjoyed its fresh scent and nourishing extracts. I can definitely see myself incorporating this cleanser into my routine, especially as we head into the warmer months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser Apr 16, 2024   This cleanser has a very unique smell to it. I can’t quite place what it is. It’s very earthy and organic plant smelling. The color of the cleanser and packaging all go along with the general theme of the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser. It’s not necessarily a bad smell or a good smell but a fresh smell. It’s something you would expect in a spa setting. I didn’t really care for the glass bottle for the cleanser. It made me nervous with tile floors and wet hands and it being soap. It does have an easy to use pump so that was nice and did like the look of the packaging it’s very pretty and I love green. I just wish there was an option for something non glass. I do understand most eco friendly companies are moving to glass from plastic to try to conserve.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is truly one the best cleansers I have ever tried! Tata Harper brand is truly the gold star standard in clean natural beauty excellence! This cleanser is really great for people oily blemish prone skin that uses high performance botanical ingredients. I was very happy to try this cleanser because even as an adult I still have acne breakouts from time to time!
