From the first use, I felt like my face was receiving an ultimate luxury natural spa treatment at home! The scent of this cleanser immediately immersed me in the power of nature. It had a beautiful herbal plant scent of the roots, stems, and absolute essence of every single natural ingredient in the bottle. This cleanser felt so good on my face as a gel cleanser that easily cleansed my face leaving my skin refreshed, clear, and soft without dryness! This cleanser targets blemish-causing impurities to give you a deep clean feel with a matte finish without drying out your skin. The Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser is an incredible natural cleanser with 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin & 46 % of the total ingredients are from organic farming. It uses prickly pear flower enzymes which exfoliate the skin helping with cell renewal and helps clear buildup to prevent blemishes without leaving skin tight or dry! It contains wild crafted Juniper fruit which balance oil without disrupting the natural pH-balance for a healthy-looking complexion. It also contains Chlorella which soothe redness and calm irritation and gives this cleanser its natural green color! Make sure to wear sunscreen while using the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser because of salicylic acid and AHAs which can increase sun sensitivity! I highly recommend the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser! It is a well crafted cleanser that truly showcases beauty by harnessing the power of nature! It will truly leave your skin looking and feeling incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a Beauty Enthusiast and a skincare fanatic I absolutely love and enjoy taking care of my skin.  Recently I have been using the Clarifying Cleanser by Tata Harper. This cleanser comes in a 4.1 fl oz/ 125 ml glass bottle.  And I am amazed by how well it works. I absolutely love it as it has truly exceeded my expectations.  This cleanser is dark green in color and has a very fresh, minty fragrance. I use this foaming gel cleanser in the morning. It is very easy to use. First, I wet my face. Then I use two pumps of the cleanser and rub it between my hands to activate the product. It starts forming bubbles and then I use the product on my face. This cleanser lathers really well. I gently massage this cleanser on my face for about a minute and then rinse my face with warm water.  My skin feels extremely clean after using this cleanser. And not just clean but my skin feels noticeably silky, smooth and shiny. This cleanser has become a staple in my skincare routine as it's gentle enough for every day use.  I will definitely rebuy this cleanser and can't recommend it enough to anyone who's looking to get clearer and more radiant, smooth looking skin. The invigorating and fresh scent of this cleanser will definitely awaken your senses.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: Love the product, the mini packaging could improve
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product and use it religiously. I especially love it while traveling when my skin sometimes hates the changes in climate - this helps calm it down and feel clean. That said, I give it 3 stars because in the past, the packaging sucks. It leaks everywhere all the time. This newest iteration is, I'm hoping, better. Hopefully they've improved the packaging. However, in all previous iterations, it was so leaky that I had to either put it in its own plastic baggy or put something around it to protect everything else in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is fine, it helps prevent breakouts. Maybe a little too exfoliating for daily use

reviews.review_title: A black girl with combination/Matte skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A friend of mine has combination skin and has used this product in the past with good results, so I was hoping to grab a bottle for them as a Christmas present. However I agree with the other comments that the price is a bit of a deterrent. Also, I've seen a comment stating that since they are black they have oily skin and large pores. Black people have many different skin types, I myself have matte skin and I've never had acne. I have many friends and family members that don't have oily skin or large pores. So I can't agree with that generalization. So don't feel like you have to buy this product only if you have oily skin or large pores (whatever your ethnicity may be). From what it's done for my friend, even combination skin or other types can benefit. 😊

reviews.review_title: I am a Licensed Esthetician and a Black Woman
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a Licensed Esthetician that's specializes in hair removal, so I never really got into the skincare side of my field. With that being said, although the skincare portion of Esthetics isn't my career, I know quite a bit about MY own skin. My client told me about this cleanser. She DID say that it was on the more expensive side but swore by it (she's extremely critical and doesn't play about her skin lol). So I looked at the reviews, watched a couple videos and decided to go into my nearest Sephora and try it out! I was on the phone with one of my girlfriends and read the ingredients out to her and she even said it sounded amazing lol! I've been using this cleanser since about March of this year (it is now November, Thanksgiving actually) and I'm just now deciding to review it. I guess in the spirit of thanksgiving, I'll say that I'm very grateful for this clarifying cleanser! I use 4x4 esthetic wipes to clean my face and I can see all of the dead skin and dirt being wiped away! Gel cleaners are best for oily skin so this cleanser paired with a great non-comedogenic moisturizer is a MUST have for oily girls like myself! I am a Black woman so I do have enlarged pores and oily skin but this cleanser really helps my skin. I have about maybe another two months before I'm all out, a little has gone a long way! This is my staple cleanser! I'm always confident even when I wear a lot of makeup because I know Tata Harper will save my skin lol! Try it out, you may not regret it!! I sure don't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing cleanser for acne prone skin, it's pricey but you will not be disappointed, skin feels clean and soft removes excess oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To me this cleanser is worth the investment. Not only do I feel like I’m in a spa every time I use it but I really do think it keeps my skin clean, clear and glowing. Could not recommend more!!!

reviews.review_title: Part of my daily face routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser so much.  It has kept my skin clear since I started using it.  The biggest issue is the price.  They keep raising the price.  Great product but the price is crazy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Love the small. I have combination skin. Not blemish prone but love the deep cleaning and removes makeup well. Use on dry face.

reviews.review_title: I never write reviews. But this is a PSA.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually if something doesn't work for me, I let it go and move on. But I have to leave a review that may a) deter someone from spending this money and b) save their skin. Not only does this smell like a cleaning product like Pine-Sol (that sticks around for HOURS after using it) but it made me break out around my mouth, little whiteheads. I've never had that happen until this cleanser. I used half a bottle, hoping it was just purging and hoping it was actually doing something for my skin. Everything evened out after I stopped using this kitchen cleaner on my face. Do not. Save your money. Save your skin. Look elsewhere for a clarifying cleanser before turning to this green sludge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this out from a sample, and wow, this cleared up my skin!  Wish I had this years ago I would have a lot less acne scars today.  You only need 2 pumps into your palm, smash your palms together and rub, then apply to your face.  Add a little bit of water to create a foam and wash away those dirty, clogged pores!  The key is to shake up the bottle, rigourously!  I mean, shake the thing up hard.  Then, pump into your palm. When you shake it, the cleanser turns into a pearly texture vs. a watery one.  Got that tip from the bottle.  It says it right there.  Shake well.  I know this stuff is a high-end cleanser aka expensive, but it is so worth it.  I won't use anything else.  Lasts me for about 6 weeks using 2x per day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This reminds me of a watered-down version of Exfolikate. Very liquid-y and smells very strong, like kitchen cooking spices. Feels tingly, skin felt clean…but I prefer the regenerating cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Black girl with a dry skin here￼
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and when I was picking up this cleanser I had no clue it was best use on oily or combination skin. Today is the day I've decided that after my 30 days of owning the product that I will be returning it but here's what I thought of it so far: The first day I use it I fell in love with it because it just left my skin feeling clean, baby soft like, cotton or silk. I absolutely love the cooling sensation I get when using this product and I actually enjoy the scent despite the fact that I see a lot of people don't. I love the feeling of luxury when I use this product. I really love how this product cleans the pores. all you need is one pump.  The price is a bit expensive for some thing that isn't made directed towards my skin and I don't need my skin feeling dry this winter. For the value and price I can find some thing that is made for my skin and that will help my skin. so that's my whole reason of returning it. If I had a oily skin I would keep it and I would continue to purchase this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not work for me . The smell is awful and it lingers on your face for a long time .it made me break out cystic acne that I didn’t have before they didn’t go away until I switched to a different cleanser .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser changed my life.. (sounds dramatic I know but really) even now in my 30’s I was still breaking out pretty badly. I went into Sephora begging someone to help me and that’s when Tata Harper  came into my life. The price tag is a little expensive but totally worth every penny. Because it’s part of the clean collection I was able to use it during my pregnancy as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After stopping birth control in my 30s, my skin went from being a little dry but no pimples in 10 years to I-must-be-back-in-high-school-oily. I was breaking out everyday and none of my previous makeup or skin care worked for my skin when my hormones changed. I got a sample with my points at some point and decided to try it when I was trying to find a new cleanser. I probably tried 8 different types over 10 weeks and this was the ONLY cleanser that didn’t make me breakout. I use it every night after getting home from work and taking off my makeup. It’s worth spending the money and getting the big bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite face wash. Given the price, would have never given it a chance. However, fell in love with it after receiving a free sample. Have since purchased twice. Easy to use and leaves my skin clean and feeling very fresh. Noticed improvements in overall appearance of my skin in only a few uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fell in love with this cleanser and have been using it for over two years. Recently I wanted to save some money and switched to a drug store acne cleanser. I broke out after 3 weeks! I’m never switching again, this is just the best. It never dries me out, just feels clean and smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser truly works... This is so far the only cleanser that has truly worked on my oily/blemished skin. It's just too bad it's so expensive so i can't keep constantly buying it again and again.. I REALLY wished they would lower the price. It is way too expensive even for the good quality that it brings... but if you CAN and ARE able to buy it.. go ahead.. it definitely works (:

reviews.review_title: get this product if you have chronic acne
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been an absolute life saver. Skin has cleared drastically since I started using it.

reviews.review_title: A must have for oily or combo skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Most amazing face wash ever! My skin feels incredible after using it. Like baby skin. Completely matte and ready for the rest of the skin care routine. A splurge but very worth it. Combo mature fair skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It 100% smells like something you would use to disinfect a toilet, but for my acne prone skin it works really well. It feels like a deep clean without stripping the skin completely. I use this as the second step of my cleansing routine, usually using it after a balm.

reviews.review_title: Acne Galore -Arrived separated and is full of oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cleanser since I had a sephora credit and the green bottles do look pretty luxe on a vanity.  It arrived separated and I could see it was full of OIL.  My fault for not looking at the ingredients beforehand, but given it is described as clarifying, I figured I'd try it on my acne prone skin.  BAD IDEA.  I had the worst breakouts ever! Whiteheads all over.  Some acne prone people can handle oil in their skincare.  I can not.  I moved over to a $9 cleanser to the Inkey List and my skin is back to normal.  The other Tata Harper cleanser also (the regenerating one) gave me acne.  I've tried most Tata Products and please, save your money unless the green fits in with your decor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve come back to this twice! It’s very potent, which I like. Results are so fast. I tried Skin Fix and didn’t find it as effective as this. Love applying to dry skin, activating with water, then leaving it on for 2 mins before rinsing off. Glow, refreshed, and acne is treated. Skin will definitely “purge” when you first use this but don’t give up! It’ll clear up gorgeously. It’s also very concentrated so it lasts forever you only need a little

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this really gives an incredible clarity and glow to my skin, i no longer need an acne serum

reviews.review_title: Good for short term but not long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this cleanser at night and another Tata Harper cleanser in the morning. This product works really well for controlling acne short term however, when I stop using it, even for a night or two, I break out. It also makes my skin a little more oily than I would like and the price point is a big drawback.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much!  But I had to return this cleanser.  The essential oils are WAY too strong and irritating.  Dont get it anywhere near the eyes - there is peppermint and menthol in the ingredients.  I found it to be stinging and burning, not at all a pleasant cooling effect. Bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This just wasn’t for me. I got a sample of this and it was oddly drying (and I have oily skin!). I also agree with people who say this smells like pinesol or some other cleaner. I suspect it’s the Chlorella, but I can’t say for sure. I usually appreciate natural-smelling skincare, but this is horrible. I don’t even like it lingering on my hands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it. Refreshing clean skin. Wonderful smell. Less breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t review this product on anything BUT the strong smell. It smells like that water from a vase with roses. It’s a raw smell, really tried liking it, but the scent was making me nauseous and gave me headaches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser leaves my skin feeling really fresh and clean BUY THIS. I absolutely love the feeling it leaves on your skin, the clarifying really describes it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I wish it worked for me :( It just keeps breaking me out. May be a good cleanser for you though. The smell is amazing idk what the other comments are saying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really glad I didn't read the mixed reviews before buying. I LOVE this cleanser!!! I don't notice a bad smell at all, just smells like a cleanser to me. What I love about it is the tingle. I will usually put it on with no water, so it's nice and thick, then I leave it on for a minute like a mini AHA & BHA facial. Then lather it with water and rinse. My face feels SO clean and not too dry. I have noticed a reduction in a big acne cluster on my chin and some fading of my scars. Love it so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and bought plenty of overpriced skin care brands I had a redness flair up on my cheeks and large pores i used this and after I used Fenty SPF serum I love not just the clean feeling but it also made my face glow the smell doesn't bother me it gets the work done is all I want and it did just that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product WORKS. I can understand why some would not like the smell, but If you are someone struggling with acne just try it out. Approaching my 30s my skin started to change and since then I have been trying to get it back on track. Tried everything over the counter and various other cleansers. I have only been using this for a few days and the stubborn zits on my chin and jaw line are drying up! Love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It clarifies without drying at all, tingly fresh, love the scent, foams up well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For the price, wasn’t a fan of how quickly it squirts out of the bottle, you lose a lot of it if you’re not careful. Didn’t love the scent / tingly feeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser lives up to the hype and is worth the money. Keeps breakouts away and skin feeling clean and refreshed. If you are only willing to splurge on one skincare item, this is it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t recommend this cleanser enough. I promise the price is worth it. It has completely changed the texture of my oil, acne prone skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like the texture, both watery and solid somehow? The other Tata cleansers are superior.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is probably my favourite of all time and is in my skincare routine alongside the tatcha rice wash which I use on alternate days or depending on the weather or my skin concern that day. applying this cleanser as a dry cleanse and slowly applying water is such a lovely experience, and my skin feels so so good and purified afterwards. I have oily/acne prone skin, and I have noticed that this product has significantly helped my skin. it does a phenomenal job of cleansing  and clearing skin without being stripping and is essential in my nighttime routine when I’m not using retinol. in my opinion, this cleanser is a must try for anyone with oily prone skin. although the price point may seem daunting, trust me, it’s well worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like old floor cleaner. Left my face burning. Why is this a thing?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Selected a sample size of this and so glad I didn’t splurge on the full size! The smell of this cleaner is… interesting. I don’t hate it but I don’t love it. The texture is VERY liquidy, when I open it I have spillage because it squirted out so fast! I like how it felt on my face but afterwards I was left with a tingly feel that I wasn’t a fan of. Overall could not justify buying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this last year and really loved it. It’s really expensive though so I wanted to find something cheaper. But no matter what cleanser I used, my skin would break out horribly. I recently switched back to using this product and my blemishes have disappeared. It does smell like household cleaner, but that dissipates quickly. This product is worth the price for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I love this more than La Mer. It’s only been a week, but the cleanser is heavenly my skin feels clean and smooth definitely not dry. This has AHA and BHA, so I still use La Mer sunscreen. But I’m noticing less oiliness and more smoothness. I think I will keep this in my arsenal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like pinesol.. I can’t get the awful smell off my hands or my face.  Do not use this product or you will regret it! Yuck

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser that leaves my skin feeling truly clean but not stripped. One star off for the strong smell! Pricey product but eliminates the need for a double cleanse which is a huge bonus for me. Pretty packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used up two sample sizes worth of this and love it. My skin feels clean and is prepped well for serum and moisturizer. The oil control continues for quite a while too, even after using face wipes later on in the day.   The smell is not good. At all. If you are sensitive to strong earthy smells then I suggest skipping this.   One star off for the smell.

reviews.review_title: if you want to smell like pinesol
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like pinesol. The sent is so strong it’s absolutely horrible. My husband could smell it from outside the bathroom. I don’t know if it works but trust me, the sent is enough to pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I selected a sample of this product because I have used other products in the line and LOVE them. Unfortunately the second I opened the tube I was hit with a smell that can only be described as bathtub cleaner. I’m sure the product probably helped my skin but I really, really don’t want to smell like bathroom spray. My husband was quite shocked when I asked him to smell my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never returned anything so fast. This product is just wow (like a BAD wow) Holy Moly HOW can a cleaner smell so bad? I’m someone who never complain about smell, ever. I actually really prefer it when there’s no fragrance but this product made me want to throw up! That’s not all. What’s up with the menthol? I felt like it was burning my face! My couldn’t have it on more than 10 seconds before feeling so uncomfortable. And the feeling stayed even after you finished washing your face. Let’s just skip this one. I’m sure there are better products out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way my skin felt after using this, however, the scent can only be compared to moldy grass clippings and Pine Sol. it's awful and lingers for hours and hours. I cannot stand to use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like Lysol. I have oil skin and I did notice since using this my skin has been quite dry (flakey dry) around my eyebrows. Unusual in that it’s very thin so, careful when opening the bottle since it’s quite expensive..

reviews.review_title: Thank god for reviewers of Sephora
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I selected this 15ml sample as part of my purchase with points. Was initially looking for a 100% natural fragrance free cleanser to remove my makeup that I could also use for regular washes. Having read the reviews beforehand, I was hesitant regarding the smell mostly, and it looks like a lot of reviewers had a few skin reactions as well.  To me, the smell is very natural herbs, very spa-ish. There’s is definitely a freshness to it which can be aggressive to some, there is menthol and menthyl lactate which I guess are present to enhance the impression of « deep cleanse », like when using Head n Shoulders and your scalp is all freshness. Honestly the mint family’s not made for every skin type. For me, this is exactly what I was looking for. I have normal skin with an acne tendancy in the chin area. This helped me cleared a lot of it and prevent my cheeks from new waves. I would trust the below reviews if you have sensitive and dry skin. That being said, Tata Harper in my opinion remains too expensive compared to other companies in the natural industry such as Josh Rosebrooke for example. Lastly, I think the runny substance is not bad at all! A little goes a VERY long way !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately smells like bleach cleaning product, it is insanely strong!! It didn't burn my skin, it did what it had to do but honestly the chemical smell is overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Did what it was supposed to…
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin was tingly and clean afterwards, it did a good job, but the consistency is super runny which caught me off guard (wasted a lot), also the smell is awful to me smells like Clorox cleanup. Would not purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this sample of Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser for a week and I am impressed with the results of my skin so far. Even though this product is recommended for Oily & Combination skin & I have have dry skin, I gave it a try anyways. This cleanser worked wonders for my skin! Cleared up my skin without stripping it dry, left it very hydrated. My skin feels softer, smoother & healthier looking. After trying a several Tata Harper's products, I can say I am officially a fan of this skincare line. Highly recommend this item & looking forward to purchasing this cleanser in full size.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT PURCHASE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely terrible for sensitive skin. I bought this product because it was recommended for acne and blemish control. I have acne and pore build-up around my chin. This product made my acne SO much worse. I realized it was the face wash only after going on vacation and using a different product, and seeing a major difference in my acne at the end of the 10 days.  I gave away the face wash to a friend who wanted to try it, and it did the same thing for her.  The only positive was the smell. It was very nice. However, the scent did not make up for the damage it did to my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product, wow. I received this as a sample and didn’t think much of it. I finally tried it and am purchasing for the foreseeable future. Like Origins Checks And Balances face wash, it gives you a clean, refreshed feeling. This face wash is less drying though. I don’t know how to describe it other than leaving my face feeling clean and exfoliated. I double wash my face, and honestly this provides everything I need to use this product alone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser saved my skin in college. I have dry, acne prone skin and this cleanser cleared out my skin and left it smoother than ever. It can be a bit drying so I like to pair it with a creamy moisturizer. It’s pricey but it’s a little bit of magic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TLDR; An effective but basic cleanser that does not live up to its luxury price tag.  I'm so disappointed in this product but not for the usual reasons. I received a sample from another retailer for a fragrance purchase and I tried it..mostly because I had no choice and was between cleansers. I have Combo/oily reactive sensitive skin. my beauty regime is non-existent because my skin reacts in an allergic rash to pretty much everything. I have mostly done nothing as far as skincare goes, not even moisturizer because my body seems to prefer it that way.  However, as I approach my fourth decade, I have noticed a general dullness in my complexion and issues with clogged pores and worsening oiliness. I found a cleanser that worked great for a while but now breaks me out as well. Enter this product. Tried and finished the sample. No rash. In addition, my face felt very clean and looked clearer. It also seemed to have cleared the cystic acne I sometimes got. So I decided to purchase a full bottle.  I was shocked at the price tag given the tiny sizes this comes in. I expected this to be about half the price it was. It has no scent that I can detect ( yay for me) it is very watery in consistency which I don't care for but can live with, and the only feeling you get when using it is a Vapo-Rub like tingle. It's green in color. It's about as basic as soap gets.  When your price tag puts you in the same category as Sisley, La Mer, and La Prairie, I need more than green soap. I need wow. I want to be mesmerized. I need to feel like I'm in a spa on the Swiss Alps. Considering I can get clarifying cleansers for $5, I need wow. This isn't wow. It's very Meh. While this works well for me (so well) I cannot justify its price tag. Its bottle would have to be a lot bigger and/or the experience would have to be much more luxuriant for me to keep repurchasing it at this price per ounce.   I'll finish this bottle but have no plans to repurchase. The search for a cleanser goes on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product but packaging still needs to be rethink. Product is very liquid and I’m always losing some product on each use. If you don’t close it properly, product will leak since it’s very runny. This is the only reason why I am giving it a 4 out of 5.  I think most of people with oily skins will love this product! I don’t have acne problems but I have a oily skin. It’s one of my faves. It leaves a fresh clean scent and feeling on your skin!  ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail- I have acne prone skin & so glad to find a cleanser that works on my skin. Worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I normally never leave reviews for products but this one deserves it. I’ve struggled with cystic acne since I was 11 (I am 21 now) and I’ve spent tens of thousands of dollars trying to clear my acne. This face wash is the only thing that has ever worked and it changed my life. My skin is the clearest it’s ever been and I have my confidence back. Thank you Tata Harper and PLEASE never get rid of this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.  I am combo/oily, and prone to breakouts, and also have very sensitive skin.  I didn't think I would be able to use, but after getting a 1.7 ounce size in something I used it and loved it!  It balances my skin well and no breakouts since I have used.  I use it once a day, usually in evening as a second cleanse.  I love the scent (another thing I'm sensitive to) and the color is fun.  If you have oily skin I'd recommend giving it a try.  It is such an enjoyable part of my routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this cleanser and was shocked by the smell. It's the strongest smelling cleanser I've ever used, and not a pleasant smell, either. It smells strongly of artificial lemon (think Lemon Pledge or Mr. Clean and patchouli. I can't believe someone decided to bottle and sell it, it's that bad.  The stench couldn't be rinsed or washed off with soap (yes, I was that desperate t get rid of it!)  It couldn't be good for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and will not be buying the full product. The colour is really off putting and chemically, but once I started putting it on my face I also noticed the SMELL - it was like putting toilet bowl cleaner on my face, and it overpowered the whole bathroom and was severely unpleasant. I genuinely thought maybe there had been a manufacturing mishap and I was using a household cleaner to wash my face, but after reading some of the other reviews I now know that no, that’s just the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cleanser I’ve ever used. I have extremely oily skin with an occasional break out. I tried a sample size, then purchased the full size. It’s refreshing and my pores actually look clean after washing my face. I don’t mind the smell and I don’t find it to be drying. I also haven’t had a single break out since I’ve been using it for the past month.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample because I like this brand, but pure chemical, think old 409 cleaner, scent has me questioning what’s actually in this product. Gross!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff left my skin feeling PARCHED after using only a quarter sized amount (I have combo skin, not particularly sensitive) and the fragrance is terrible. I got a deluxe sample and tried it out because I love some of this brand’s other products, but this stuff was awful. The only thing I liked about it was that it had a cooling/tingling effect, but that could be due to the essential oils which, in turn, could also be responsible for drying my skin out. Might be better for people with super oily skin.

reviews.review_title: Worth the money! Great for my sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has worked wonders for my skin! Its expensive but worth it and has lasted me 5 months with 2x daily use!  Also hubby loves the scent, so thats a huge plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is, by far, the worst cleanser I have ever used. I normally like Tata Harper’s products, but I just tried a sample of this and it has the most menthol (an irritant) of any product I’ve ever used, including muscle rubs. Just putting it on my eyebrows and upper cheeks made my eyelids burn from the menthol, and even 20 minutes later my skin feels uncomfortable. Companies add menthol to products like this to make you feel like you can ‘feel it working’, but it doesn’t come with added benefit and usually much less is used. I used this after a cleansing balm so my face was already pretty clean. It left behind a film that felt almost powdery, even after rinsing multiple times and using a warm cloth. I don’t think I’ve ever liked a cleanser less, which surprised me because I love the Regenerating Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love what this cleanser can do to improve my texturized skin, but packaging needs a serious improvement. 1) I feel bad how small 50ml tube is and I paid $45 for it. Either make it taller or please provide us with a smaller bottle with a pump; 2) the way the tube sits leads to leakage and waste of products. Watery formula is okay, but the tube isn’t the best packaging for that formula. Especially, Your product isn’t cheap and we don’t want to waste any of it.

reviews.review_title: Great for oily skin and hyperpigmentation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite cleaners of all time. I have oily skin and deal with hyperpigmentation. This product really provides a deep clean and has helped me with the texture of my skin. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with oily, sensitive skin, I like this cleanser as a refreshing and non-drying option. I used a sample so I can’t testify as to its effectiveness against acne. Unfortunately, the formulation is just so thin - it’s like water. It foams up a bit but in general the consistency is just not what I prefer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My husband gets slight breakouts and deals with oily skin... he loves this and his face is way less oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser literally draws out all the whiteheads on my nose. It’s great for people with oily or blemished skin because it thoroughly cleanse and helps minimize existing pimples. The texture is watery so I took off a star for that but it works. The ingredients are natural and it’s a good cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and it’s okay. I haven’t seen any dramatic improvements but it hasn’t irritated my skin or anything. The smell definitely is off-putting. It smells like Wella toner if I’m being honest. I you dye your hair at home(not the box dye) and have gone to Sally’s or a beauty supply store and have bought a toner for your hair, this is what it smells like. I kinda can stand it and kinda not. I’ll keep using it but not sure I’ll purchase. What’s weird is that my boyfriend says it smells nice when he’s close to my face. Lol. So to each their own.

reviews.review_title: give it a try, it’s excellent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice cleanser for acne prone skin. My face feels matte and refreshed after using it. Everyone seems to be complaining about the smell but it’s actually not that bad. To me I feel like it smells like it’s got natural ingredients, and not like the other brands that smell quite nice but are super heavily fragranced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Strong chemical fragrance and too watery. After used u feel the bad fragrance from your face whole day. It doesn’t worth for that price. Plus it’s too small tube...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product and instantly fell in love! It leaves your skin looking so beautiful, clean and glowy. Who doesn’t love a good glow? I don’t understand all the negative comments about the scent.. yes there’s a scent, but it’s not as dramatic as some of these users are explaining it to be. I didn’t even really notice the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this cleaner including the smell. Takes every bit of makeup off with one step and a small pump of product. My skin is so refreshed and soft after and truly clean. No irritation or squeaky tight skin. The smell is a gorgeous green herbal fragrance that reminds me of a spa, not for everyone I see from other reviews. I was gifted this by my mom for the holidays but I plan on adding this to my skin care lineup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm cracking up reading the reviews of everyone hating the smell because I think the smell is the BEST part of this product! ha! To me the fragrance is very herbal and has a wonderful cold sensation that really feels like it's cleaning your face, while still being quite nourishing. I went to find the full size and gasped at the price, so I will be buying the smaller size. I had no negative reactions to this product and really truly enjoy it! Sad it has to be so pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm actually surprised by the amount of negative reviews for this product. I received it as a sample, and while it's smell and appearance isn't very pretty, I find it more algae-ish than chemically smelling.  I have dry, sensitive skin that's prone to outbreaks, and this product feels very nice with the cooling menthol sensation, and it left my skin very soft and free from new breakouts. Only 4 stars due to the outrageous price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells terrible! Kind of reminds me of strong patchouli oil. Gross!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample of this. Didn't read the reviews before I tried it. Can confirm smells just like Seventh generation toilet cleaner. I thought maybe mine was tampered with or something, because there's no way tata harper for 72.00 would smell like cleaner nope. Common issue apparently. Wouldn't recommend or even want to try any other products. Stick witch Tatcha for a real luxurious clean beauty experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells and looks like household cleaner ! under first impression the packaging was very elegant.  as soon as I opened the bottle I was hit with this extremely potent smell resembling the household cleaner fantastik.  unfortunately the consistency  also missed the books for me as it's very liquid like and when face wash is runny like that it can get messy. I washed my face with it immediately after oil cleansing the first time. it dried my skin out so much That I had throw on my extra heavy moisturizer almost immediately as my face felt so tight. the second time I tried it without oil cleansing first and I still found my skin dry.  unfortunately this one didn't quite impress

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It has a fairly strong smell, but the sensation that leaves menthol I like, it deeply cleanses the skin. it dries a bit I would not use it daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample with one of my purchases, just used it in the shower and it was the most potent, awful smelling cleanser I’ve ever used . I immediately had to find something with another scent to scrub my face with because the smell lingered. I truly don’t think I’ve smelled something worse .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell and it made my oily sensitive skin have a rash after use.. will not use again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only had a sample of this product and I used it once and threw the rest of it away. It has a horrible scent like spicy ethnic mixed with chemicals or something. My son even noticed and said “what is that smell?” I’m not sure if the product works well because the smell is horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, it has to be addressed 'cuz the people need to know! Ha. On the first try, the smell is mildly to wildly offensive. Yeah, like Windex or Chlorox, so brace yourself. BUT, you get used to the smell after a few times, and the strong soothing and cool feeling takes over and it's kind of addicting. But note, because of the menthol ingredient, this might not be good for sensitive skin. The cleanser is very thin and liquid-y, but you don't need to use too much. It also provides mild exfoliation, and afterwards my face feels clean, soft, smooth and even looks glow-y. It is however a bit drying. For reference, my skin is normal/combo. For me, I wouldn't use this twice a day. I think just once a day or even every couple to few days is fine depending on your oiliness. But, I'm finding it to work really well during aunt flow's visit when my face is at it's oiliest. In addition, chlorella algae has a whole slew of amazing benefits, including tons of antioxidants, vitamins a, b, c to help with skin turnover, improve elasticity, as well as reduce redness and inflammation. Now if you can get over the smell and price, this is a great product! Love it! Deduct a star only because it's SO expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't get me wrong, my skin definitely does feel smooth and clean but this product smells like straight up Windex.

reviews.review_title: This is Clean?? If you’re a paint brush.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am shocked this cleanser is “clean.” It smells like paint... full of chemicals. Not to mention very pricey. This product is a definite no for me. Tatcha cleansers are my go to. So much better... luxurious, leave my face feeling so clean and soft, and worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Just thinking of the smell of this makes me gag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a deluxe sample. I can't even comment on how it works because the smell made me retch. I had to wash my face twice with a different cleanser to get rid of the smell. Think: industrial off-brand toilet cleaner. Pine-sol gone bad. Just No

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample so I didn’t do much research before using it but it’s definitely not meant for dry skin like mine. I also wasn’t a fan of the menthol which is cooling but can be very irritating to the skin, especially for people who are fighting with irritations and redness. I’m assuming they put it in to offset the tinglyness of exfoliation. The smell was okay for me but it’s much too strong for your face. I think I’m only a fan of the AHAs and BHAs that they put in there. I used it on my KP covered arms to exfoliate them so at least it has some use! For the face...would not recommend to anyone.

reviews.review_title: Smells like floor cleaner and tingles a LOT
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t think this product does enough to warrant it’s hefty price tag. Yes it cleansed my skin, did it deep clean? Not really. It didn’t leave a clean glow, didn’t leave my skin feeling moisturized.    It is also heavily fragrances and unfortunately the juniper berries and willow bark make it smell an awful lot like pine floor cleaner. Fragrance also tends to irritate my skin and cause redness.    There’s also menthol in this product which gives off a cooling/tingling sensation, if you have breakouts or sensitive skin it can burn and is terrible if you get it in your eyes so don’t use this product to remove eye makeup. The tingling lasts even after I rinsed it off. The only perk I can see from this is that it can be a bit of a refreshing way to wake up in the morning.  I love Tata’s masks but I don’t think I would purchase this cleanser in a full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It works well for me. I stopped using it for two weeks just to see, and my acne came right back so I guess this a part of my permanent routine now. It doesn’t eliminate my acne, but greatly reduces my breakouts, clears up blemishes quickly, and my face isn’t as oily.  I am in my 30s, caucasian (Italian/Anglo genetic background), fair skin, prone to burn in the sun, combination/acne prone - Adult acne since age 31 (mostly zits/whiteheads, pimples sometimes).

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have had acne for approximately 13 years, I have tried many products from high ends to drug store, you name it. Once my acne was finally under control, I was looking for something that would help with post acne mark as well as blemishes. After reading all the reviews about how the skin would brighten up and the scars would faded with this very expensive cleanser, I’ve decided to purchase this product. I saw NO DIFFERENCE at all after finishing the whole bottle. My skin looked exactly the same, red marks, post acne marks, and blemishes. The smell is not that pleasant. Given this price and how little it did to my skin, I DO NOT recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this. It really does what it claims- helps with blemish & oil control. It is a little runny when it comes out  but I can always get it all on my face. I have already bought a second mini size- the large is pricey. I have not gotten any pimples since I started using it, & I use it with a scrub.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is very expensive, and it did absolutely nothing for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I did not notice any changes to my skin. it did not break me out but did not clear me up either. felt refreshing but results were non existent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot recommend this product more. This brand is nothing short of amazing. I’m obsessed. I always let it set for a few minutes after I apply it dry, as like a mini mask. My skin has cleared up immensely and the way my skin look even after just using it is unlike anything. This brand is slowly taking over my routine. I alternate between this and the oil cleanser and they are both worth the price. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing after using it for a month I noticed my acne cleared up and my skin looked smoother .. this cleanser does not lather on its own but I tend add water after I rub the product into my skin so that it can lather and I can get that soapy effect before I wash it off. Since my first use I have repurchased this product along with others from this brand. It’s pricey but worth it my skin is clear .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love clean beauty and I respect this brand a lot. But this product did nothing for my acne, and in fact it seemed to aggravate it. Algae in products is a bit of a double edged sword. It helps with inflammation but it’s comedogenic and clogs pores - therefore exacerbating acne-prone skin :/ For the enormous price, I expected much more and unfortunately had to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Does absolutely NOTHING for my acne prone skin. I feel like I just paid for the beautiful packaging. Also beware that this produces minimal lather so you feel as though you need more to feel clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is seriously magic. If you have acne prone skin use this with a cleansing brush (RIP clarisonic) and the clarifying moisturizer from Tata and you will see major results.   Couldn't live without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was the worst cleanser I ever used. Went right back to the store. It certainly does, as description says, smell of roots and earth (dirt) - it was very offensive. Also, it did not clean my face nearly as well as other cleansers. A fail for my oily skin - and the scent was just noxious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cleanser is amazing! Leaves my skin feeling so smooth, matte, but not dry. The smell is amazing and I can still smell that minty scent throughout the day. Haven’t been using it long enough to see if it’ll improve my hyperpigmentation but I’m optimistic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My goodness this stuff is incredible. I used it about every other day and it just destroyed my acne and made my skin look fabulous. Just make sure you have a good moisturizer to use after (I recommend pairing this with the belif aqua bomb) because it will also dry out your skin if you're not super oily like I am.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser, skin feels cool, fresh and clean, I wouldn’t call this a gel as it is more of a liquid so be careful if it’s the first time not to waste the product. I’ve reordered and would recommend but it comes with a higher price.

reviews.review_title: Great cleanser for pores and brightness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and came back to buy a bottle -- definitely a surprise winner. While I'm not actively fighting acne at the moment (thanks to a long-standing prescription regimen), I have some t-zone oiliness and my pores are more noticeable around my nose. I've noticed some clarifying around that area and generally more of a brightness to my skin after I cleanse. The experience is also part of why I love it -- it smells great (plant-based so some folks might not like that) and it tingles in a good way. I'm generally pretty meh about cleansers but hooked on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper. This Regenerating Cleanser Daily Exfoliating Treatment made with 16 high performance ingredients organically farmed works perfectly to reveal a beautiful, smooth and radiant skin. Great for all skin types, it has a pleasant citrusy smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this for about 5 months and my skin has never been better while not being on prescription acne meds. I'm almost 30, and have always had moderate acne of every kind. I only use it once per day about 5 days per wk. I was nervous to buy this due to the price but I think it is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love for my acne prone skin. my husband who has black heads did not feel that it made a difference but for my oil prone skin it felt nice, cleansing, and refreshing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this cleanser dries out the skin so badly, I have oily skin but it does not work even for my skin type. I need to apply a loooot of products after using this cleanser to restore the balance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my second time trying tata harper out, and i’m highly disappointed. i love that their products are all glass, earth conscious, and ethically sourced. this product definitely delivers an experience, leaving your face feeling minty fresh. HOWEVER, it does absolutely nothing. nothing!!! my skin didn’t glow, it didn’t calm my acne, in fact i broke out more than i usually do while using this product. for the price your paying and how raved about tata harper is, this product is very mediocre.  if you have amazing skin to begin with, want the spa experience and can afford this product, definitely get it. but if you’re looking for results? pass on this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser tingles in a good way I noticed an improvement in my skin but I think it smells awful. It’s like rotten herbs. Plus the scent lingers. It’s also watery so it gets all over everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this cleanser.  It smells like your at an expensive organic spa and cleans beautifully without drying out your skin or making it feel tight.  I love the tingling sensation and use it in the morning.  I'm able to get away with using only one pump which is great as tata harper products are pretty pricey! Don't forget to apply to dry skin and then add a little water to get a nice lather!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the best cleanser i’ve ever used, i was having a problem with “maskne” and this face wash clears and keeps the breakouts away!! My only issue is how much product you get for the price, doesn’t last very long and is pricey. But overall i love and will continue to purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell was too overwhelming. I couldn't use it even though I held my nose. I gave it three stars because I gave it to my 22 year old daughter with acne and she loves it?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many cleansers for my oily/combo skin and this is the first one to help ease the grease and congestion and still work with my dry spots. I am on my 3rd bottle and don’t plan to switch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite face wash. Very effective cleanser without stripping. Also, a very invigorating and refreshing experience to use it. I don’t use it daily because of the price and still see results every time.

reviews.review_title: My favourite product of all time?!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm hooked on this cleanser for life and it's worth every penny!!!! Once you apply, you won't want to rinse it off because you can immediately feel it working. This basically gives my skin nostrils after each use... my skin literally breathes out of every pore. On hot summer days this is perfect because there is a cooling sensation once you start lathering. Zero irritation, zero redness even on my extremely sensitive skin. This is excellent for oil control and clearing up blemishes. Also, the glow you get from using this is crazy... I know brightening isn't this cleanser's main purpose but it's an amazing side effect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: On my second bottle. Works great. Skin is clear and no irritation or dryness. Worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this smells weird af? like kitchen cleaning product, doesn't smell natural at all. but I like that it foams and doesn't strip my skin, but idk if I can get over the smell. for this price? nah

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had really high hopes for this cleanser after finally taking the plunge to buy it. First use seemed pretty great, I liked the smell, consistency was thin but ok, and the cooling sensation left my skin feeling very clean. Fast forward 24 hours and I start developing large painful pustules on my chin and jaw area. They started popping up one at a time and then two at a time. At first I thought the product might be purging my skin but after a few days it was so bad that I had to run out to buy another cleanser and some products to try to calm down the breakouts. While my skin is prone to blemishes, I have never experienced acne like this in my life. I hate to leave a bad review but I wish I had paid more attention to the 1 star reviews since others have experienced this as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: literally smells like windex BUT has a cooling, refreshing feel when working in & more importantly, keeps your skin properly cleansed & bright! def NOT for dry or very sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: cleared my skin up and makes its sooo soft. make sure you apply it on dry skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the BEST cleanser I have ever used. And I use a lot of products. Ive struggles with acne my whole life, and it got quite bad again recently. In the winter I usually have super dry skin and spring/summer I’m pretty oily.  The first time I used this i noticed a difference I love how refreshed my skin feels, and it gets rid of the oil without stripping the skin. I love it so much, so glad I found this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST cleanser I've ever used (and most expensive). Only reason I would dock a star is because of the price. But I saw immediate results in brightening the skin. I do like how it's green but I was turned off by the smell at the beginning. It's a quite strong minty scent that's almost medicinal, but I got used to it after awhile. Especially when it feels refreshing on the skin the moment it foams up. It's nice to use in the morning to give yourself a wake up.  I have oily combo skin and always tend to get pimples around my chin and jawline. After a month of using this, I haven't had any breakouts! And my acne scars are starting to fade. It gives you a nice deep cleanse without stripping your skin and leaving that uncomfortable tight squeaky clean feeling. Your skin feels soft, brighter and still retains moisture afterwards. I've been using other foaming cleaners up to this point and it always leaves my skin tight and dry.   The redness and blemishes I used to have are reduced and my skin isn't as oily as before, even now as we are entering summer. I just wish the price wasn't a $100 CAD for a bottle. Maybe if it was bigger. But it looks like it'll last me at least 4-5 months so it's worth it imo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did a lot of research as I began to have adult acne. I purchased my first bottle and did notice that it began to work from day 1 no joke! I understand it’s expensive but I’m currently on my second bottle and still think it’s worth every penny. I try to limit my use of this cleanser at night, and whenever I wash my hair to make sure I get the hunk off my face. Use this with a toner and great moisturizer and it will do wonders!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this cleanser for two years, and I can't imagine my skin without it. My skin is oily and acne prone, but with this cleanser, which I use twice a day, my skin feels healthy, dewy and zero oily

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally! A cleanser that eradicated the small bumps under my skin! I’ve been trying all kinds of cleansers to keep my post-menopausal skin free of breakouts. Most helped but nothing eliminated the bumps that developed under my skin. This cleanser worked to eliminate both problems. Hate to say it, but it is worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only used this ONE TIME and I already see a huge difference on my face since last night!! So excited to see how much this will help me in the upcoming weeks!!! The cleanser is super refreshing and doesn’t make your skin feel dry at all once you wash off! Feels like this is worth the money :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm still debating on whether or not this is worth the price tag, but I do keep repurchasing, so clearly it must be. I only deducted 1 star because of the price. I love this cleanser - it helps keep my skin clear (which is a task being that I am acne prone), feels invigorating once rinsed off, leaves me feeling clean but not stripped. It really is great and the fact that it is made from CLEAN ingredients, really makes me love it for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So worth the money. My go-to whenever the breakouts start.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has become my favorite night time cleanser. I’m on my second bottle and I have my 3rd on the way. It definitely helps clearing up my acne scars and leave such a cool sensation on the skin. I do wish the price didn’t increase but one bottle lasts me about 6+ months so its worth the investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cleanser!! This was my first time purchasing such an expensive one. I been using it for a week now. Not one break out! I usually break out once a day or once ever other day lol Before i used 10% benzoyl peroxide. I know crazy lol. But this works even better! I haven’t gotten one breakout!! I’m serious! My new favorite. Don’t forget, if you purchase this use it on dry skin. I suggest at least 2 pumps. You can feel it cleaning and exfoliating your skin. It has a minty smell to it. I personally like that. I use it before my retinol serum and it doesn’t dry out my skin at all. Treat yourself and purchase this. You won’t be disappointed. Remember on dry skin! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of all of the Tata Harper products I’ve tried.  This cleanser being one of them.  I have oily skin and I suffer from hormonal breakouts.  This cleanser cleans without stripping and, if you let sit on your skin, can act as a mask.  I honestly wish this product didn’t work, because I absolutely hate that the price is so high.  Still, I am on my third bottle with no intention of ever being without it.  If it’s in your budget, I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I've ever used. I used to have very bad acne as a teenager. My acne started to subside as I got older, but then it came back....I tried a lot of different things (some that I tried in the past) and nothing worked. Only this amazing green bottle of joy. I love using it on dry skin. It makes my face feel so amazing after washing it off. No tightness or dryness. I am on my 4th bottle of this. Using morning and night, the bottle lasts a little over a month. So a bit expensive for how much you get, but so worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Rarely has any expensive skincare item that I have purchased been worth the money. But this is different. It is very powerful, so I haven't had a need to use it everyday. It find it particularly useful for hormonal breakouts. It helps to provide such a good environment for the skin. If you have issues with acne, and oily skin, this is for you. It is definitely worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews, but this is that good. After only a few days of using the redness and inflammation around my acne is going down. The scent is very strong though. If you don’t like grassy/mint then this would not be for you. It has a very cooling effect when using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only been using this for a couple days but when you have problematic skin like me, you can tell a good skin care product from a bad one, fast! This cleanser is so soft and gentle on my skin I love it. My skin is so supple after I wash it, its not dried out and thirsty for hydration, its the winter time so that says a lot, also this is an oil control cleanser so the fact that my skin doesn't feel dried up after I use it is great. I wash my face with cold water and because this has some kind of peppermint feeling on the skin the water feels twice as cold which I don't mind because it wakes me up and I feel so refreshed after washing my face with it. I'm so happy I found a great cleanser that is also clean. I hope it lasts a long time because of the price point but other than that, its amazing and I would highly recommend it to anyone struggling with their problematic skin.

reviews.review_title: Not particularly acne clearing but enjoyable
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will preface this by saying this cleanser is drying and strips the skin of oil.   I am charmed by it more than anything, the scent, the bottle, the company ethics and the feeling while you cleanse which is refreshing and feels very clarifying and fresh. You'll need to add that hydration back after use.   Did not particularly clear my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Only been using this cleanser a little over a week but I am already seeing results in my skin! My pimples have gone down in redness and size and I haven’t gotten any new ones yet. Pricy but doing great things for me so far. It smells funky but really feels like its cleaning. I like the look of the bottle too. My boyfriend said “that looks like it cost $800.” Very happy with this cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great for dry acne prone skin, expensive but worth it for the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this as a sample so far and I love how it makes my skin actually feel cleansed! I plan on getting this once I save more money. I do wish it was a cheaper price, but this works so well I don’t mind. I love the color, it also doesn’t smell funky. Feels great on my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this cleanser is amazing and totally worth the price! i have been using it for 5 days and my skin is clear. i’ve used many different products (expensive ones too) and nothing worked like this cleanser. just make sure you use a good moisturizer if you have drier skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Do I think it’s overpriced..yes. But my 60 yr old sensitive/combo skin responds better to this than any other cleanser I’ve tried. Evens out skin ruddy skin tone, definitely helps my clogged pore areas. Refreshing. Nice light foam and rinses off clean but doesn’t leave me parched. Worth my money to come back to familiar product and consistently receive superior results for my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Since purchasing Tata Harper’s Clarifying cleanser my face has become clear and radiant. I have also noticed the cleanser has help with my pigmentation, my skin has become more toned. I love the cool feeling it gives when applying on dry skin. It has a nice lather when I rinse it off. Definitely recommending this project to all my oily/acne prone skin friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried about the price of this product; but boy oh boy am I happy.   I have oily skin so finding a cleanser that removes the correct amount of oil off my skin has been difficult. This product leaves my skin feeling great, and looking amazing. I've noticed a huge difference in the appearance and overall look of my skin since using it; and my skin isn't as oily throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fait super bien pour une peau sensible (eczéma au visage)  Nettoie en profondeur avec sensation de pureté

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its okay. But it is definitely not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser transformed my skin in three days!!! After weeks of dealing with hormonal chin and jaw acne that seemed to be getting worse no matter what I tried, I switched to using this along with the Nourishing Oil Cleanser from Tata. I was worried this one would be too drying for my skin and heard that all of Tata’s products can be mixed. This is exactly the combo my skin needed. My skin feels incredibly smooth and matte after I use this, to the point where I want to keep touching my face! Any texture I had on my skin before is gone and my breakouts have diminished a great deal. Again—I’ve only been using this for THREE DAYS. This cleanser and the Nourishing Oil Cleanser are straight up magical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As upset as I am that this product has increased in price by four dollars with no formula change or increase in amount of product, I will still continue to purchase this God send. I used to only use this at on long days that I was wearing heavy makeup (because it's so pricey!) but after seeing the beautiful results, I've began using it day and night and my skin has never looked better. This cleanses so well without leaving my skin squeaky and uncomfortably clean/dry feeling. I apply it with dry hands on a dry face and massage it into the skin, then rinse off with warm water. It then lathers to a soft foam, and it smells clean and minty. If I need a really deep clean, I will use a facial brush as I'm rinsing with water. This cleanser balances my skin, leaving it refreshed and bright, and free of texture, especially when I use my facial brush (about once or twice a week).
