Using one pump twice a day doesn't stretch the product very long in my opinion which is kind of disappointing considering the price but I cannot be without this cleanser and I would recommend it to any normal or oily-skinned person who is looking to combat acne, blemishes, or texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it makes my face clean, fresh and ready for the night.

reviews.review_title: wanted to love but broke me out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for 3 or 4 days now and each day I wake up to new pimples. This stuff is breaking me out more and more every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser for acne and blemish prone skin, leaves the skin clean and fresh. It’s on a pricey side but works wonders so I will definitely buy more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. This stuff is $72 and I'm buying my second bottle. My skin doesn't usually respond to salicylic acid but my oily, acne-prone skin stopped breaking out when I started my first bottle and started breaking out again when I ran out. I wasn't planning on buying more, I thought I was just getting the wanting this product out of my system by buying one bottle, but I guess this is a staple now. Only con, while I don't mind the smell and I usually mind smells, but if I wash my face before bed the smell will distract me while I'm trying to go to sleep. It's not a bad smell, like a guy's cologne but I'm not crazy about cologne. I am crazy about this stuff, it's great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you use Retina A, this cleanser is way too drying! Made my skin feel tight like leather and very flaky. This may be good for those who don’t use retinoids. It does leave your skin feeling very clean, but not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cleanser of all time. I’ve stopped looking for and trying other things because this is it! I consider it a cleaning mask because it clears out my pores a well. I also like the Purifying cleanser but if I could only have 1 skin care product, it would be the Clarifying cleanser! Hands down

reviews.review_title: Satisfactory results for oily, acne-prone skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for just over a month and have been very satisfied with the results. I have oily, acne-prone skin and thus far, this cleanser has kept my breakouts at bay and controlled my oiliness. It actually leaves your skin moisturizer rather than drying you out, like most other acne cleansers. I use it morning and night, massaging about 1-2 pumps onto my skin, and will leave it on for 5-10 minutes, as I finish getting ready, which I think leaving it on helps even more than just rinsing it off instantly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only cleanser that I have noticed a major difference in my skin... it keeps hormonal break outs away. The scent is just a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I experienced this cleanser as a complete shot in the dark, as I was looking for a new cleanser and making a sample round at Sephora. I wasn't too impressed with it at first, and the smell was quite strong. At this pricepoint I was determined to dislike it, so I could safely go on my way onto something better and more affordable. What ended up happening was that I fell in love and purchased the full size. It's got a nice cooling feeling on your skin and it looks and feels like it has sucked up all the gunk that lives there. Leaves skin soft, smooth, and doesn't dry it out. The product mileage is insane; I only end up needing a few drops to cleanse my entire face. Seriously the best cleanser I have ever used, and I used to make a Sephora Sample Round so I've tried a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser.. it gives you that cool sensation clean feel. My favorite cleanser!

reviews.review_title: You get what you paid for
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this after reading reviews and totally worth the splurge. I have occasional hormone-related breakouts and my pores are huge I can see them without going too close to the mirror. It resolved all that and the clean and fresh feeling you get after washing your face is just superb. On my 2nd bottle and also used the exfoliator one too. Both are great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is liquid gold. I have always struggled with adult acne and have tried countless products with no avail. I hesitated trying because, let’s face it, this line is expensive. BUT I was IMPRESSED with results just after the first week. Since I’ve been using, 6 months, my face has not had a single breakout and the over all texture is glowing and vibrant. I recommend making the investment if you’re struggling like I was.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It’s gentle and it really does clear up my skin and stop breakouts from getting out of hand. I use this and also the purifying cleanser, which is also good, but I like this one better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells like it’s working! Lovely lather. New user but high hopes to solve this 30something blemished skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this from my co worker because she couldn’t use it and I am so glad I did !! This lasted so long... a little goes a long way and it keeps my acne at bay. I think I will splurge on the entire line because this cleanser is amazing. Doesn’t overdry but your skin feels so clean afterwards. Since I’ve run out I had to use another product and my skin is so much more oily . I’m going back to Tata ASAP.... highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: acne didnt improve at all, if anything this product irritated my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this product during the VIP sell. I seen a few review on youtube so decided to try it. I love this product. It doesn't dry my skin out. and it has cleared up my acne within 1 week. This product has made me incorporate more clean products into my skin routine. The only down side is this product is very expensive, but on the flip side it is worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me just start by saying I did not know there was a holy grail cleanser before I began using the clarifying cleanser. The past two years or so I have struggled with hormonal acne. While I had managed to get my acne slightly under control using prescription medications, I was still experiencing more blemishes than I would like as a twenty-something. Then insert the clarifying cleanser. I began using this and have never looked back. I never feel as though my skin is stripped, dry, or agitated after using the cleanser. The smell is refreshing and my skin feels awake after use. While it is a dry cleanser I usually get my hands slightly wet and pat my face prior to pumping a small amount and massaging around my face. I use less than a dime-sized amount each time and it gets the job done - which justifies the sticker price for the product to me (plus the fact that my face hasn't looked better in years). To be transparent, along with the oral medication (not accutane) and this clarifying cleanser I also utilize the UFO(morning) and Luna(evening) oils from Sunday Riley following belif's true cream aqua bomb moisturizer. I recently added the luna oil to my regimen but prior had been using the UFO oil morning and night but wanted to try out the addition of Luna. Overall this cleanser is something I will continue to repurchase over and over again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best HANDS DOWN!!! 60secs per day with this keeps acne away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne prone skin and my go to cleanser was discontinued. After reading the reviews, I decided to take a chance on this and I’m so glad I did. This takes off makeup really well and isn’t drying. It’s expensive but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect cleanser for summer.  It's pricey but worth it.  My skin loves it!

reviews.review_title: No more oily forehead and breakouts under control

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Can a cleanser change lives?  This one comes close!  For real though I have super sensitive skin and have struggled with  hormonal acne for a long time. It calms my skin and clears up my acne.   It's pricey but you're worth it.

reviews.review_title: Non-toxic and now I’m non-acne person
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This review might be biased because I am totally hooked on and obsessed with Tata Harper and her beauty statement of non-toxic and natural living. As a past acne sufferer I always thought that going for gentle and sensitive skin face washes would be my best bet, which didn’t prevent my breakouts from showing up to the party. Until recently my laser genesis esthetician recommended trying something with anti-acne properties so that one pimple that comes and revisits never bothers me. This product is heaven sent, it doesn’t dry out my skin, ever since I’ve been using it, which is about a month, I didn’t get any white heads my blackheads are gone as well. Added bonus is that it’s natural and no toxins will penetrate your skin and go to your body. Although I checked EWG website and it wasn’t their top rated product but it’s pretty clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favourite cleansers! You can feel it working! It's effective yet doesn't dry out my face or make it tight. Love how it foams up when you add water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is fully a godsend. It really helped in clearing up my hormonal acne and is gentle enough to use daily with my prescription retinol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been incorporating more natural products into my beauty routine.  Especially those products with silicone.  I was really sad to stop using my La Mer, Omorovicza and Amore Pacific Products.  But, I have found anything with silicone terribly clogs my pores and makes me break out.  Now, don’t get me wrong, the products I use previously work great for my mom with dry skin.  But, I have combination skin and I’m thankful I found these Products from Tata Harper.  The clarifying cleanser feels tingly and rejuvenating each time I use it!  I love how refreshed I feel after I wash my face now!  It leaves no residue and does not dry out my skin.  It is a fantastic balancing cleanser!  My breakouts have been significantly minimized in the couple weeks I’ve been using this product.  I use in conjunction with the hydrating floral essence and clarifying moisturizer, both from Tata Harper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail!!!   This is the first face cleanser that I have been through 3 whole bottles of and have just purchased my 4th. One ingredient could make my face a nightmare for weeks, but not since I’ve started to use this cleanser.  My skin is absolutely calm, even toned, no breakouts.  I can’t say enough good things about this cleanser and I have tried everything.  I use this in combination with herbivore’s lapis oil. It may be a little expensive but if you are like me and have spent hundreds of dollars trying to fix your skin, give this a shot. It may work for you!

Worth the price I'd say, considering that the product is vegan and has natural ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin (more oily now in my 30s than used to be in my 20s).  I get hormonal acne on my chin. Ugh.  Not a lot of stuff helps to clear hormonal acne but Tara clarifying cleaner has deff helped more than anything else I’ve tried.  I still get the odd pimple on my chin which i think is unavoidable unless you go to a derm and take meds for it....but my skin is so much better than before After using this. No derm required.  It’s pricy but I figure if you factor in all the acne creams and jumping from cleanser to cleanse to find what works you may as well save the money and buy something effective.  Would totally recommend this!  Also smells so natural / I really like that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I reviewed it one star last time just coz it was delivered to me leaking and damaged though it was managed well by the customer service. I’ve been using it for a week now twice a day morning and evening and it works really well never thought my skin could get this better. I lurv the smell too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do not often write reviews... but this product is INCREDIBLE! I was previously using Clinique’s regimen for oily skin, and while it was working adequately, this stuff smoothened out my skin after just the first use, made my skin noticeably less red, and my breakouts are so much more manageable now. It’s a little expensive, and the smell isn’t lovely, but absolutely worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff broke me out so badly in spots I NEVER break out in and my skin is still reeling from it a week after. Super unfortunate because I wanted to like it, and all the reviews are pretty good. I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave reviews, but this cleanser has changed my skin for the better. I’ve been using just this cleanser and the biossance probiotic moisturizer for a few weeks, and my skin is radiant. Please give this cleanser a try for a few weeks if you have acne and I promise you will be so happy. This product rocksssss!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this smells and makes my skin feel but I feel it is too little product to cost nearly $70. I understand we’re buying the brand name but I feel it is a tad ridiculous the cost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use one pump of this product 2-3x a day (depending on if I exercise). I’ve had it for five weeks, and I’m roughly halfway through the bottle. Before purchasing this product, I used the Purpose liquid soap, which made my face feel uncomfortably tight. This product controls the oil on my forehead. It visibly brightens my face and makes it comfortably matte (which I didn’t realize was possible before using it). I really, really like it. It’s a great addition to my skincare routine. It is expensive, but it’s worth it to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start off by saying that I recently quit my job so spending $68 on a cleanser REALLY REALLY hurt me...physically and mentally. I debated and debated buying this for days. I am SO GLAD I DID BECAUSE it is totally paying off!!! I don't get a ton of acne, but when I do, I scar very easily, get dark marks all the time, and with summer I get lots of blackheads I can't get rid of. I've tried so many cleansers, acne treatments, masks, peels, voodoo, praying to the Sephora Gods, essentially everything...and nothing really works. BUT, THIS stupidly expensive cleanser has cleared up my skin significantly in just 3 days. I don't know what kind of magic is bottled up in this thing but it actually works. I'm excited to see what my skin will look like in 2 weeks. I still think it's incredibly expensive, but it might actually be worth it!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I mean.... THE BEST CLEANSER literally! I have these bumps that just wont go away. Use this once and its subsided, hope it will make it go for good. Love the scent so much, its like the smell of grass. Worth every penny! Use this with my clarissonic. Seriously give this a try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser, it alwasy leaves my skin refreshed and cool. Love the smell, the texture, supergreen color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 25 years old and I struggle with acne. I have been using this product along with a spin brush for a little over 2 weeks and I have seen a difference in my acne. While I still get a couple of white heads, my acne is no where near as bad as it was before I started using this product. The problem that I have with this product is how fast it goes. I have probably used about a third of the bottle in the small amount of time I have had it. I was initially using 2-3 pumps the first few days before I realized you don't need that much product. I recommend using only 1 pump, maybe even less if you want it to really last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this cleanser!!! I love Tata’s products and this is one of my faves. I came back from a 2-day trip recently and my skin was going crazy from all the flying.  I bought this cleanser the next day and my skin calmed down incredibly fast. My skin feels really fresh but not stripped after using this, and I love the smell. It has a really nice bright scent. I’ve been using it most days AM and PM and my super oily, acne-prone skin is loving it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far it’s worked really well for me! I haven’t had any big breakouts, my blackheads are still there but I wasn’t expect miracles with any face wash. My skin texture is combination and for the most part it helps with keeping my skin hydrated but not too much! The smell is a bit strong and can irritate your eyes if they’re super sensitive, and the whole applying it on a dry face is strange, but if you aren’t picky it shouldn’t be a problem.   My only issue with this cleanser was how fast it goes! The price is a little expensive given how quickly it’s used up. Other than that, if you don’t mind the price I would definitely give it a shot as my face always feels super clean after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve struggled with occasional cystic acne for years, when I say I’ve tried it all - I truly feel as if I have. TH clarifying cleanser is the FIRST time I’ve gone an entire month without a breakout and my skin is truly glowing! Worth every penny. Just purchased the clarifying moisturizer and anticipate to love it equally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is incredible. My skin felt totally different from the first wash! Now that I’ve used it a few weeks (full disclosure, I also added the Clinique Acne Solutions Toner at the same time) my skin is noticably more even, my pores look smaller and my makeup goes on better. A recent bad breakout that started before I used this cleanser cleared right up. It is expensive but one pump goes a long way. I’m using it only twice a day (I usually wash my face three times per day) to help preserve it, but it is so worth the money!

reviews.review_title: I FOUND MY HOLY GRAIL FOR ANCE
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is wonderful on my skin! I have struggled with my acne for 2 yrs now. Once cleansing my face with this clarifying cleanser my pores automatically looked smaller and my acne was not so inflamed. The ingredients are so natural and not too strong. My skin is not sensitive but when it comes to acne my skin overreacts and starts flaming out. This kills the bacteria and sucks out all the bad oils and leaves the good oils in and I feel ten times cleaner and confident that my skin looks healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It doesn't control oil nor prevent breakouts. I haven't had serious break outs in a looong time and it probably wasn't from this cleanser but it certainly did not help. Using this cleanser, my oil production is exactly the same as well. The minty-cooling of the face is a bit much for me but that's personal preference. You also go through it very quickly, so for the price- this is not worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser ever! I have never had such soft skin after washing my face. It smells amazing and also I have been breaking out recently and this has been helping my skin clear right up and look amazing. LOVE LOVE LOVE!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. I rarely write reviews, i’ve been trying different cleanser for two years and none have come close to this. It cleared up my skin in two days ! And my face has been consistently clear since. I pair it with the regenerating cleanser in the am. I know it’s pricey for a cleanser but it has saved my skin ! Worth the money !!

reviews.review_title: Actually worth the price you pay!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly never thought I would find a cleanser that worked. I REALLY never thought I would find one that exceeded my expectations.   I've used high-priced cleansers before so I was hesitant to try this one only to throw it away after a month. Y'all: the reviews are LEGIT. I was in the dermatologist's office EVERY MONTH to have professional microdermabraision to help my adult acne (I'm almost 38) and hyperpigmintation from the old acne. I didn't have widespread acne, but I almost always had a deep zit around my mouth or chin that just about required surgery to eradicate. Since I started using this cleanser, I've cancelled my microderm appointments and have been able to completely stop my prescription acne creams (which insurance no longer covered btw) and the random zit I get heals quickly and the scars dissapear even quicker. I have found the gold standard in my skincare routine and will NEVER be without this again.  Did I mention I've only been using this cleanser for a month? And I started noticing a difference after a WEEK. Trust me. This green bottle is worth it. You truly only need one pump, twice a day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love! you apply to dry skin then add a little water to your hands to continue cleansing, i use my clarisonic as well and love it! it leaves your skin clean but not tight feeling and with a refreshing cooling sensation. Hasn't caused any breakouts and i do notice a difference in the pore size on my nose since using this for about 3 weeks now. will be repurchasing! the only downside is the bottle is glass and big so it's hard to travel with but you can just buy a smaller refillable travel bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin but most cleanser still makes my skin feel dry after washing so I've been on a hunt for a natural/organic cleanser.  This cleanser is so expensive and I've not have bought it if not for the VIB sale in April. This cleanser smells very nice, light minty scent.  Its texture is lovely (not too thick nor thin) and you dont need to use a lot.  Because of the minty fragrance, it is very cooling on your skin (lovely for the hot summer).  It does clean well and my skin feels slightly brighten post cleansing.  I am not sure if this breaks me out, however.  I've had a few white heads on my forehead and around my nose since the use of this, but I also have started a few items (skincare and makeup products) that I have yet pinpointed if this is the culprit, hence I did not dock off a star.  Again, it is expensive, but if it indeed does not break me out, then it is worth it.  Side note: the bottle is gorgeous on my counter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whoa. I read the description and the initial 8 reviews and thought to myself I've found the perfect product so throw that in the basket and buy it. Then it sold out, eventually was able to buy it. Tried that night and immediately was impressed. The smell...well it's strong. I'm not in love with it. But as I was rubbing it on my face I could feel the cooling start, and it just felt refreshing. My face gets dry really easily so after I washed it off I could feel it getting dry, but not as bad as other products. I sprayed my toner on, then my Lapis face oil. In the morning - oh my word. I felt like I could have walked right out of the house no make up. I felt positively radiant. I have been dealing with some breakouts recently, which causes redness. And I honestly felt like things had improved overnight. I have only used this a couple of days, so I'll update later...but I am so impressed. This mixed with my Herbivore stuff I think I'm set. If you've got some concerns about unbalanced skin etc...GIVE THIS A TRY. Will check out other Tata products now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is top notch. I love Tata harper masks and moisturizers, but I haven't found any of the other cleansers to really suit my skin type. This clarifying cleanser, however is a game changer! It smells amazing, a little goes a long way, and after my face feels clean but not dry (or oily!).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Evens out skin tone, calms redness, leaves skin soft and matte! Does what it says!! Freaking expensive!!! I’m being stingy with this. Strictly, only in the mornings 1-2 pumps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this for I think a couple weeks now and I love it. The cooling sensation feels great after wearing makeup all day and my skin doesn’t feel stripped. I started out using the resurfacing mask, fell in love with that, and thought I’d try this since it’s made for blemishes and oily prone skin. The only negative I have are the prices. I would LOVE nothing more than to switch over to this brand entirely but the prices are horrendous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best cleanser I have ever had! Love the smell

reviews.review_title: Addicted to Tata Harper skin care!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's definitely worth quickly googling this brand. Not only is it all natural, it works Fast! I use this and double cleanse in the evening with the Nourishing oil cleanser and it's VERY nice. It's different than any other acne prone product Ive tried as it doesnt cause any dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its a great physical exfoliant.  Nice mild smell. Small beads.  Nice nourishing carrier for exfoliant.  Very pricey.  Not entirely sure its worth the price but i buy it anyway.  Great user experience and best with sponge/cloth for removal

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In my late twenties my acne has become a major concern. I haven’t been able to find any product that addressed this without totally drying out my skin. Immediately after using this new product My skin felt so clean and refreshed and my redness and irritation was reduced. I love using this cleanser with Tata’s Clarifying Mask- the two together totally transform my skin. I’m hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily / combination skin and have been looking for a cleanser that leaves me with a matte finish, but doesn't feel like my skin is dried out.  Tried the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser and I am obsessed!  It has changed my skin in just 1 week!  And the scent is so fresh and amazing ... I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is perfect. I loved the Tata Clarifying Mask so I had to try this right away. I have oily / combo skin and get occasional breakouts, so I'm always looking for cleansers that leaves my skin matte without stripping it and this is that cleanser, FINALLY. Your skin feels super soft and hydrated while also being matte at the same time, it's awesome. It's great to use in the morning to prep your skin for primer   makeup. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with this new cleanser from Tata Harper!  It's a green foaming cleanser for oily/combo skin and leaves your face feeling so fresh and clean but not stripped and dry!!  Love the minty smell.  Well done Tata!!!  New fave!!
